Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

Job Description:
The Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is a research establishment and public utility placed under the patronage of the Cambodian Government, & associated with the international network of the Pasteur Institutes. The activities of the Virology Unit at IPC are directed towards biomedical research and the monitoring of infectious diseases. They can be divided in four main the matics: arboviruses (mainly dengue), encephalitis (e.g. Japanese encephalitis, EV71) respiratory syndromes (e.g. seasonal influenza, avian influenza H5N1, MERS-CoV), and zoonotic and emerging pathogens (e.g. nipah virus). In each of these topics, the Unit has developed numerous research programs.

The LACANET One Health Project, funded by the European Union, aims to develop a bi-national Lao PDR-Cambodia One Health Surveillance and Laboratory Network through three specific objectives: 
(1) improve diagnostic abilities in Lao PDR and Cambodian national laboratories for diseases at the human-animal-environment interface, 
(2) develop capacity to conduct surveillance for zoonotic diseases at the human-animal-environment interface, and
(3) improve mechanisms of collaboration between animal and human health sectors. The Virology Unit at IPC is the lead coordinating institution for this project.
Job Requirement:
- The project manager will assist the project coordinator with the overall administrative, financial and scientific coordination of the project. 
- The project manager will assist the project coordinator who is responsible for overall coordination 
- Receiving strategic, technical, and administrative guidance from the Steering Committee, the Technical Advisory Committee and the IPC management support team. 
- Candidates should hold a PhD degree or MSc degree in a relevant field such as microbiology, biology, project management; or have considerable relevant experience.

** The complete application file includes a cover letter, copies of diplomas if any, work certificates, curriculum vitae with a recent photo, Identity Card photocopy - all certified documents to the originals – are to be sent to Mr. Philippe DUSSART, Head of Virology Unit of Institut Pasteur du Cambodge 
(e-mail: pdussart@pasteur-kh.org, Contact number: 017 333 140).

** Deadline: February 20th, 2015
Guillaume DAUFRESNE               
Finance & Administrative Director 

Dr. Didier FONTENILLE
Director of Institut Pasteur du Cambodge
Company Profile: The Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is a Cambodian non-for-profit research institution established in 1953, IPC is today a scientific research establishment declared of public utility placed under the high patronage of the Ministry of Health of the Kingdom of Cambodia and under the responsibility of the Institute Pasteur on the scientific and technical levels. The IPC is a member of the Pasteur Network, which brings together 33 institutes present on five continents. It shares the Pasteurian values and the ethical charter to which the Pasteur Institutes are bound. The IPC has more than 250 employees, including about 30 expatriates of 10 nationalities and includes 5 research units. It carries out research activities in health biology, public health and service activities (Medical Biology Laboratory, vaccinations and water and food analyses) and training.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Philippe DUSSART  017 333 140 #5 boulevard Monivong, Phnom Penh  017 333 140

Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

Job Description:
- Follow school curriculum and particular set of course timeline,
- Submit and keep a weekly lesson plan,
- Prepare lesson to suit with student learning abilities,
- Arouse the interest of students towards the lessons,
- Maintain students’ participation,
- Clearly focus on school’s subject matters,
- Design and implement supplementary activities,
- Motivate inactive or slow learning student to be more active,
- Use English language while teaching and working in the school,
- Be proficient in all aspects of subjects,
- Address individual differences of  students,
- Diagnose learner's needs and remedy where necessary,
- Evaluate student learning outcomes through written, oral, and practical methods,
- Adhere to the class schedule and school policies,
- Maintain a clean and orderly classroom,
- Inculcate a respect for school property and facilities of students,
- Conduct Parent-Teacher conferences,
- Help in any school program daily or occasionally,
- Always look after students’ security,
- Attend technical meetings, administrative meetings, planned school events and other school activities,
- Adopt new methodologies,
- Create standard exams for students and,
- Maintain an accurate Marks Record that reflects the progress and ability of every student.
Job Requirement:
- At least two years of teaching experience – teaching, nursery, kindergarten and primary grades,
- Hold a valid teaching certificate or teaching license,
- Demonstrate teaching competency and passion to teach children,
- Has a pleasant personality and must be willing to work in a team,
- Teachers will need to assist in providing parent education, promoting parent involvement and perform a variety of duties relative to assigned area of responsibility,
- Candidates must have a degree in early childhood education or related fields,
- Certified female teacher is preferred.

Job Description:
The Marketing Executive is responsible for implementing the company's marketing communication strategy for new products and seasonal sales promotions with the aim to increase sales, promote the Sony brand; engage and communicate the products' benefits to customers at the retail level. You'll report to the Marketing Manager.

*RESPONSIBILITIES:
- Demonstrate technical marketing skills and company product knowledge (Consumer Electronics)
- To manage all aspects of print production, receipt and distribution of Point of Sales Materials
- Analysing and investigating price trend, demand and competition
- Compiling sales and statistical information (E.g. weekly sales performance)
- Organising new product launch and sales promotion events, co-promotions with partners and campaigns on social media
- Maintain good relationship with distributors and their retail representatives
Job Requirement:
- Master in Business Administrations (Local institution) Candidate with oversea business Degree will be considered for Assistant Manager role
- Have good command in English
- Minimum 2 years of product marketing or marketing communications experience
- Interests in consumer electronics products
- Strong project management and planning skills
- Highly proficient in Microsoft Office (Excel, PowerPoint, Word and Outlook)
- Good interpersonal and communication skills/ Ability to develop lasting professional relationships with people

job title: Corporate Sales Executive - Siem Reap (Salary 250$ + Sales Commission)
position: Corporate Sales Executive - Siem Reap (Salary 250$ + Sales Commission)
Job Description:
•	Generate new business opportunities resulting in an increase in Corporate Kofi's annual revenue
•	Determines annual and gross-profit plans by forecasting; establishing pricing strategies; recommending selling prices; monitoring costs, competition, supply, and demand
•	Build & maintain a database of corporate customers 
•	Identify corporate customer needs and develop specific proposals along with the individual outlets for delivery and also with corporate for pricing & other terms. 
•	Build & maintain a relationship with every corporate customer through regular emails, telephone calling & visits. 
•	Enlarge the contact base within the corporate customers to reach out to more departments & divisions 
•	Be responsible for achieving targets in the designated areas 
•	Regular Reporting & Follow-ups with every corporate customer
•	Provides information by collecting, analyzing, and summarizing data and trends.
•	Protects organization's value by keeping information confidential
Job Requirement:
REQUIREMENTS
•	Male and Female
•	Bachelor degree, major in Sales and Marketing, Business Admin, English or relevant
•	Minimum one year professional working experience in sales and marketing
•	Advance computer skills and proficient in Ms. Office, and Internet-Email
•	Excellent communication skills both verbal and written 
•	Excellent interpersonal skills and presentation skill
•	Advance level of English,
•	Ability to challenge and debate issues of importance to the organization.
•	Maintain a positive morale and professional attitude
•	Proactively establish and maintain effective working team relationships with all support departments
•	Positive attitudes

OTHER BENEFITS:

• Basic Salary 250$ (Negotiation)
• Sales Commission & Bonus on monthly hit target.
• Entertainment Budget.
• Gasoline Card
• Phone Allowance
• Phone Credit Allowance.
• Yearly Bonus based on company incentive scheme
• Allowance for Training and Development program based on performance evaluation
• Award and Recognition for best employment of the year in Staff Party
• Promotion opportunity
• Maternity leave wages, Staff wedding wages and Retirement fund.
• Team Building Trip
• Personal Insurance (Forte & NSSF)
• (Monday - Saturday Haft Morning)
• 18 Annual Leave
• Full of Public Holiday.
• Policy follows by Cambodia Labor Law.

HOW TO APPLY:

Interested candidates should summit the resume and cover letter with current (4x6) photograph, details of qualifications to KOFI Group by Email: job@kofi.com.kh or submit to Siem Reap office: Sivatha Blvd, Sangkat Svay Dangkum, Siem Reap Province. 

 For more detail, please go through our Website Address: www.kofi.com.kh

Tel: 069 777 188/ (069 777 199 Siem Reap)
* Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for interview.
Closing Date: February 28th, 2015

Email:job@kofi.com.kh

We import quality equipment & product all over the world to ensure you are only using the best. We also provide reliable after sales services to support you as you start your coffee business journey.

 Founded in 2009, KOFI is one of the largest company which distributes Espresso coffee, Espresso coffee machine, Syrup and other related coffee accessories in Cambodia. Our main priority is to focus on quality services, professionalism and integrity.

Company Profile: គ្រឹះស្ថានមីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ អ៊ូរី ហ្វាយនែន ខេមបូឌា ភីអិលស៊ី គឺជាគ្រឹះស្ថានមីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ទទួលបានអាជ្ញាប័ណ្ណពីធនាគារជាតិនៃកម្ពុជា ដែលមានភាគទុនិកជា WOORI BANK នៅប្រទេសកូរ៉េ ។ ធនាគារ WOORI BANK គឺជាធនាគារមួយក្នុងចំណោមធនាគារធំៗ ៤ នៅក្នុងប្រទេសកូរ៉េ ដែលមានទ្រព្យសកម្មចំនួន ២០៨កោដិ ដុល្លាអាមេរិក មានសាខានៅក្នុងប្រទេសកូរ៉េចំនួន៩៨៩ សាខាក្រៅប្រទេសចំនួន១៧ និងក្រុមហ៊ុនបុត្រសម្ព័ន្ធចំនួន ៩នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក ។ គ្រឹះស្ថាន អ៊ូរី ហ្វាយនែន ខេមបូឌា ភីអិលស៊ី បានដូរឈ្មោះមកពីគ្រឹះស្ថាន ម្លិះ ហ្វាយនែន ភីអិលស៊ី ។ គ្រឹះស្ថាន អ៊ូរី ហ្វាយនែន ខេមបូឌា ភីអិលស៊ី នឹងពង្រីកទីផ្សារឥណទានរបស់ខ្លួនទៅដល់សហគ្រាសខ្នាតតូច និងខ្នាតមធ្យម (SMEs) និងកម្លាយខ្លួនទៅជាធនាគារ ពាណិជ្ជក្នុងរយៈពេលដ៍ខ្លីខាងមុខ ។
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Ret Sakea  023 999 661 / 023 999 662/ 070 999 114 119B, St. 271, Sankat Phsar Deum Thkov, Chamkarmon, Phnom Penh.   023 999 661 / 023 999 662/ 070 999 114

Job Description: #NAME?
Job Requirement:
- Team work and Friendly.
- Honest, Hard working, and Polite and Friendly.
- Good communication and negotiation skills.
- Good Hand writing, and attention detail.
- Must be able to speak English.
- Able to use Word/Excel/Power point, and Internet Email. ( Type Khmer Unicode)
- Full time job from 8 am to 5 pm (Lunch break 1 hour between 12-1pm)
- Working day from Monday to Saturday.
- Require to work on the phone and talk on the phone most of the time.
- Prepare report and good at basic calculation.

We are looking for the serious people who are working hard, and want to have a great experience and grow with the company.
Company Profile: San international Co.,Ltd. is located in Phnom Penh with 30 years experience in retail and wholesaling business which classified as Tyre Distributor of Brand Dunlop, Yokohama, Westlake car tire. More over, we also provide car battery and idemitsu Japan No. 1 Oil. Beside, we also provide professional sound system as Bose brand speaker with many years of experiences.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr.Tang Koung Air  +855 11 762 168 / +855 96 366 8698 290, Monivong Blvd, Phnom Penh, Cambodia  +855 11 762 168 / +855 96 366 8698

Job Description:
- Manage Sales Representatives by training sales techniques, including directing customers by helping them select the right products and offering recommendations. 
- Teach other staff how to use products within the store, giving advice on customer service workflow.
- Work with the manager and inventory officer to control stock levels inside the various stores. 
- Oversee the cashier/POS system (in certain situations you will have to be the cashier).
- Analyze top selling products and determine the perfect product mix for the various stores to generate more sales Work with other staff and oversee product display and keeping the store clean (products, racks, general cleaning); Other adhoc tasks as required.
Job Requirement:
- A candidate with prior retail shop experience (2-3 years) is required. A university degree is a plus but not a strict requirement. 
- English & Khmer language skills are required for this position.
- A basic understanding of computer systems and usage is required.The candidate must be proactive, hardworking, polite and enthusiastic.  
- Additional language skills will be looked upon favorably (Chinese – Korean – Japanese - French). 
- Can speak Chinese is prefer to apply

JA : 1016
Working Time : 10:00～20:00
Working Day : Irregular (1 Day off per week)

How to Apply 
Interested candidate, please submit CV and Cover Letter with stating your expected salary via email or office address below.
HOW TO APPLY FASTER
Contact Person: Mr. Pich
Address: #298, Monivong Blvd., Tous Les Jours Monivong Building 1st floor,Phnom Penh
Telephone: 023 964 864 / 023 555 0118
Email: pich.cdl.kh@gmail.com
Company Profile:
Creative Diamond Links Human Resources (CDL HR),is the best leading recruitment company, provides high quality recruitment and HR services to local and foreign companies in Cambodia. 
At the same time, we provide career counseling to the Cambodian workforce and introduce the best qualified candidates to you, giving you the freedom to leverage saving time and effort while being able to employ the best people for your company. 
Specialized services by our international team of HR Consultants are available to you in English, German, Khmer, Japanese, Chinese and Korean.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Officer   023 964 764 Tous Les Jours Monivong Building,1st Floor, #298, Preah Monivong Blvd. Sagnkat Boeung Raing,Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penhh.  023 964 764

Job Description:
Demonstrate and participate in team work
- Undertake nurse responsibilities in consultation with Medical Staff
- Perform any X Rays, ECGs when requested by the doctor
- Carry out initial assessment with all patients
- Assists with the insertion of IV Catheter, blood collection and IV fluid administration
- Perform minor procedures and wound dressing
- Liaise with pathology to ensure correct information is transferred to and from pathology when requested to do so by Medical Staff
- Liaise with the Laboratory, and external health services for patient referral
- Keep all work areas clean, tidy, and hygienically safe
- Undertake your daily responsibilities of caring for equipment as instructed by supervisor
- Responsible for administering medication when rostered to do so
- First point of contact for all patients, demonstrating a high standard of customer service
- Hand over patient information to incoming nurses at change of shift
- Demonstrate motivation at work and good communication
- Abide by rostered hours including night time on call duties
- Respect and abide by Formosa Clinic policies
Job Requirement:
- Hold a Bachelor of Nursing recognized by Cambodian Ministry of Education or recognised international Health Service.
- Applicants should be no older than 50 years of age.
- Willing to learn, improve knowledge and continue learning
- Available for flexible working hours, able to work day and night shifts on rational basis
- Ability to build good inter-personal relationships
- Good command of English (written/spoken/comprehension)
- Computer literacy
- Able to actively participate in a team environment

*** How to apply:

Job Description:
Our business partner is a Franchise Bakery Shop and currently we are seeking for qualified candidate to fill the position Procurement Manager expanding their business.

+ Responsibilities:
- Lead and develop the purchasing team to manage the whole order fulfillment cycle from sourcing to delivery to provide for timely solution for the 
business.
- Formulate policies and set operating procedures for inventory management and to supervise the daily operations including stock control, stock-re-order level, and the movement of stock are at all times efficient and effective.
- Responsible for the scheduling, and purchasing plan for raw materials, as well as the compiling of the monthly purchase and inventory report and price analysis
- Responsible for all purchasing activities, such as price/trade terms negotiations. Monitor supplier’s performance measurement and execution of corrective action plans.
- To continuously review all aspects of the operations procedure and SOP to improve internal Key Performance Indicators to meet the business objectives of the Company.
- To regularly prepare various reports and analysis including inventory budget report and provide recommendations for management review.

+ Requirements:
- 5 year experience in purchasing and inventory management of which 3 years at managerial level gained from sizable organization.
- Degree holder in Purchasing and Supply Chain Management or equivalent Solid experience in sourcing and purchasing of raw materials for beer, food & beverage, transportation and mechanical spare parts will be a distinct advantage.
- Excellent planning, organizing, and analytical skills with detailed mind Good command of both spoken and written English, knowledge of other Asian languages is a plus.

+ Conditions and Benefits:
- Working time: 8:30am-12:00am | 1:00pm-5:30pm
- Working days: Monday-Saturday(Half)
- Holidays: Saturday(Half), Sunday & Legal Holidays
- Salary is $1000 up
- Milk
- Incentive
- 24 Hours Insurance

Company Profile:
New Gateway International School(GIS)
We initiate the education of our students at their level of preparedness by providing the highest quality learning experiences we can provide that lead to the success of everyone involved, especially the targeted success of students.

We focus our efforts on academic preparation for all of our students and professional or career preparation when such an emphasis is suitable. We emphasize the success of our students in ways that fit their needs and goals. Practical applications of learning will build confidence among students about their competence in various capacities.

We promote language familiarity and mastery, mathematics, science, history, social sciences, physical education, the arts, and other disciplines as integral parts of their curriculum.

OUR MISSION
To prepare a generation of thinking and committed citizens who are capable of contributing towards Cambodia’s continued growth and prosperity. Constantly revisiting the curriculum to ensure that the skills and knowledge taught in our school meets the challenges of the 21st century. New Gateway International School empowers students to achieve educational, professional, and personal success through lifelong learning in our dynamic and original school. Students will be prepared for living successfully as future leaders and responsible caring members of Cambodian society. We provide specialized, comprehensive, and supportive educational experiences, foster academic integrity, and encourage lifelong learning.

CURRICULUM
NGIS curriculum aims to nurture each child to his/her full potential, to discover their talents and to develop in them a passion for life-long learning. Students go through a broad range of experiences to develop the skills and values that they will need for life. The broad-based curriculum imparts literacy, numeracy, bilingualism, the sciences, humanities, aesthetics, physical education, civics and moral education, and National Education.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Andy   No. 2, St. 156-211, Sangkat Veal Vong, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh, Cambodia.

Job Description:
Our business partner's company has just established in Cambodia recently.Their business focuses on installment (Hire-Purchase) of electric appliance which is new for Cambodia but popular in other countries. Their group holds the company in 9 countries and has 28 million Credit Card Holders. Our Vision: In Japan and the rest of Asia, their management philosophy is to “Support customer’s life styles and enable each individual to maximize future opportunities through effective use of credit”. Currently the company is seeking for the potential Candidate for the position Human resource Manager.
+ Responsibilities:
- Recruit new employees to fill existing and anticipated vacancies, supervision of the selection process for various department 
- Supervise the selection process for various section awards and Periodic needs assessments to determine evolving and changing training requirements 
- Establishes recruiting requirements by studying organization plans and objectives; meeting with managers to discuss needs 
- Builds applicant sources by researching and contacting community services, colleges, employment agencies, recruiters, media, and internet sites 
- Determines applicant requirements by studying job description and job qualifications 
- Prepare employment contract and register new staff 
- Report monthly staff movement (in & out) 
- Record and report all staff leave (AL, Special leave, sick leave, maternity leave………..ect.) 
- Oversee talent acquisition, succession planning, compensation, retention, training and leadership development 
- Prepare, facilitate, monitor, evaluate and document training activities in the company 
- Assess training needs for new and existing employees 
- Identify internal and external training programs to address competency gaps

job title: Project Assistant for Sponsorship Information $332 to $415
position: Project Assistant for Sponsorship Information $332 to $415
Job Description:
I. THE PURPOSE OF THE POSITION
To assist ADP Manager in managing sponsorship service operations and data entry through Registered Child (RC) Monitoring Form, Annual Update, ID Card Scanner in ways that meet the national and partnership standards, guidelines and policies and data quality assurance.
II. MAJOR RESPONSIBILITIES
- Process Sponsor Letters (SLs) / Child Reply Letters (CRLs) in compliance with the STEP business process requirements
- Process sponsorship business regarding Hold Management
- Process Introductory Letters (ILs) in compliance with the STEP business process requirements.
- Process new RC / Growth in STEP in compliance with the business process requirements
- Process Water Festival Card (WFC) and Annual Progress Report (APR) in compliance with the STEP business process requirements.
- Process queries and requests from sponsors and support office in compliance with the STEP business process requirements.
- Ensure that each child folder is updated, properly filed and stored in a secure place
- Input information on the RC Presence Monitoring Lists, supplementary RC monitoring form, ID card scanner, annual update, and child validation form
- Ensure that every RC and RC caregivers are participated in and benefited from ADP activities
- Assure quality in sponsorship correspondence products.
- Assist in Child Protection according to Child Protection Policy (CPP).
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree Information Technology or any social science 
- At least 1 – 2 years experience in sponsorship business or in community development project
- Experience in English to Khmer / Khmer to English translation
- Experience in working with children in a development context
- Good command of English
- Good understanding of child protection
- Good understanding of sponsorship business process
- Proficiency in computer—Database system management, MS Word and MS Excel

Job Description:
• Establish and implement strategic marketing plans, budgets and activities in relation to company’s products and services to achieve corporate goals.
• Develop and review budgets, forecasts and reports on products and services, and pricing trends.
• Roll out pricing strategy and structure to achieve the revenue and profit objectives of the company
• Review corporate objectives and strategies for market penetration and expansion.
• Manage market research, analyze data and information to evaluate customer insights, market conditions, and competitor activities to implement appropriate marketing mix to create and deliver value to various market segments.
• Assess go-to-market requirements, establish market awareness plans and strategies to maximize the company’s brand exposure to achieve the marketing objective
• To developing brand priorities and strategies to win across different market channels including distributors, wholesalers, retailers, etc.
• Develops policies and key marketing initiatives for the department to use as guidance for Sales.
• Manage, motivate, train and develop the marketing team to ensure delivery
Job Requirement:
• Should be a degree holder in marketing, communication, or related field.
• With a minimum of 10 years of marketing experience in Food & Beverage industry preferably from beer products, with at least 5 years of managerial experience gained from sizeable organizations such as F & N or Yeo’s.
• Excellent product knowledge and familiar with the beer market, competitors and industry trends.
• Excellent knowledge and experience in brand management, integrated marketing, and event management.
• Highly competent in managing multiple projects simultaneously.
• Self-motivated, creative, innovative strategic business thinker and able to work under tight deadlines.
• Highly effective, result oriented and able to effectively prioritize and execute tasks in a high-pressure environment
• Excellent problem solving and planning skills with strong leadership.
• A good team player with strong interpersonal, communication, and organization skills.
• Excellent in written and spoken English. Understand other Asian languages will be an added advantage
• Proficiency in using MS word, excel, PowerPoint, etc.

Job Description:
** Location : Ream Naval Clinic Sihanoukville, Cambodia


- Under limited supervision will use standardized and accredited laboratory procedures to execute assays in the Laboratory Department in the Laboratory Capacity Building Project for Clinical Laboratory. 
- Will examine and confirm quality of clinical samples, prepare media and/or reagents specific to Laboratory assays, perform Laboratory assays and procedures and handle specimens. 
- Will ensure Laboratory specific protocols and the Laboratory Safety Instructions are followed and will maintain a record of work performed in laboratory notebooks and computer data files. 
- Will ensure proper collection, accessioning, processing, storage and transportation of specimens per specific protocols was followed.  
- Supervises the availability of Laboratory supplies, reagents, media and equipment to ensure continuity of Laboratory operations. 
- Provides training to laboratory personnel on specimen collection, accessioning, processing, storage and transportation of specimens follow the specific protocols.  
- Provides didactic and hands-on training of laboratory safety, clinical laboratory assays, clinical laboratory practices and standard operating procedures, including quality control (QA/QC) to support quality of result, to laboratory personnel under the supervision of senior officer.
- Provide didactic and hand on training in post-examination phase such as data interpretation, recording (data management) and critical analysis of results and reports all such findings to senior personnel.
Job Requirement:
- Certificate of medical laboratory associate/bachelor degree
- Minimum 3 years of experience in clinical laboratory (Phlebotomy, Hematology, Chemistry, Serology, Microscopy and Basic Bacteriology)
- Able to conduct the training of clinical laboratory techniques such as Hematology, Chemistry, Serology, Microscopy and basic Bacteriology technique.
- Understanding the trainee learning - different person/group, different situation, learning theory, and how the trainee learn best Experience in preparing document for training and train on clinical laboratory technique is preferred
- Responsible for creating and implementing training programs and overseeing the development of field staff; Develop, implement, and monitor training programs within an organization
- Ability to work well in team
- Honest, hard- working, well-organized, ability to solve the problem
- Able to work independently with minimum supervision
- Computer skill (Microsoft Word, Excel, Power- Point)
- Good communication skills ( both written and spoken) in English

Interested candidates shall submit their CV and Cover Letter attention to Human Resource Department/Chenda Polyclinic or via Email: pui@chendapolyclinic.com/hr@chendapolyclinic.com
The supporting document will be needed at the time of interview appointment. The deadline of application submitting will be on 29 February, 2015. Early application will be early considered.
Company Profile: Chenda Polyclinic is one of the foremost medical treatment facilities in Phnom Penh. Located in an expansive modern facility just north of Wat Phnom, the clinic is equipped with the expertise and technology required to handle a wide variety of medical issues, from routine check- ups and pre-employment medical exams to emergency surgery, at an affordable price.

Job Description:
- Carrying out activities for the preparation of the registration of indigenous people’s land will include especially:
• supporting LNGOs in the making of indigenous people communities’ 	unofficial maps inworking out internal rules and in filing land registration 	applications to the cadastral authorities, 
• resolving disputes in coordination with other GIZ staff, local authorities, 	LNGOs and 	indigenous people communities, and 
• preparing and conducting capacity development measures such as trainings 	for Government, LNGOs and indigenous people communities
- Undertake assigned tasks with indigenous people communities, with Government, with LNGOs and INGOs, and with all other involved stakeholders. 
- Draft work plans including budgets covering the activities that you will carry out and coordinate.
- Prepare reports as needed by the Program Manager and Deputy. Assist them as needed to fulfil their Monitoring & Evaluation tasks.
Job Requirement:
- University degree in an area related to the project objectives.
- At least 5 years working experience with indigenous people on land matters and cooperating with misc. Government agencies and civil society organizations involved in the topic.
- At least 3 of the 5 years include assisting indigenous people communities to make unofficial maps, internal rules and file land registration applications of a quality that was acceptable to the Government.
- Highly competent at communicating/coordinating with all types of stakeholders involved with indigenous peoples’ communal land titling. 
- Knowledgeable in all areas of indigenous peoples’ communal land titling in addition to making unofficial maps, internal rules, filing land registration applications and resolving disputes.
- Very good English skills, both oral and written.

Company Profile:
GIZ is a federally owned enterprise and is supporting the German Government in achieving its objectives in the field of international cooperation for sustainable development. 

For our Social Health Protection Programme (SHPP), we are seeking for a candidate for the position of Junior Advisor for Health Service Delivery (national professional), based in Kampong Thom.

The Cambodian - German Social Health Protection Programme provides technical and financial assistance to the Ministry of Health and other institutions within the framework of the Health Sector Strategic Plan of the Ministry of Health (MoH) and Provincial Health Department (PHD) in Kampong Thom, Kampot and Kep province. The overall objective of the joint programme of German Development Cooperation and the Ministry of Health is that the poor and vulnerable population in Cambodia is healthier and faces less financial burden by using quality health care services.

The health services delivery (HSD) interventions focus on strengthening quality improvement mechanisms within the Cambodian health system by assisting the Ministry of Health to develop policy documents and guidelines for better quality in health care at national and provincial level. The Junior Advisor for HSD will work under the supervision of provincial health manager for coordinating and providing technical advice to counterparts for systematic implementation of quality improvement measures at provincial and health facilities.
Contact Info: Contact Information Ms. Sineth Heang HR Manager  No. 17, Street 306, P.O. Box 81, Phnom Penh

Job Description:
1. Manage Cash & Bank 
   - Petty Cash payment and cash control
   - Bank account control
   - Daily cash flow forecast and balance control, include monthly cash flow forecast.
   - Bank reconcile
   - Control credit facilities from bank (if any)
2. Accounts Payable 
   - Reconcile purchase of raw material /non-material on journal per invoices/delivery sheets with verification of P/O and authorized signature.
   - Make payments to suppliers based on P/O
   - Provide sub-ledger of AP with aging report and reconcile balance with GL to prevent the over-due payment to suppliers.
   - Make balance confirmation with suppliers at least once a year to prevent the missing.
3. Support with Cost accounting 
   - Calculate standard cost for each item (if necessary)
   - Calculate monthly material/sub-material consumption, production cost and cost of sales with production variance (if any)
4. Accounts Receivable 
   - Recognize sales per sale invoices on journal and sub ledger.
   - Issue receipts and recognize collection on journal and sub ledger for balance control by customer.
   - Provide AR aging report to follow-up the over-due.
   - Make balance confirmation with customers at least once a year to prevent the missing.
5. Fixed Asset Control 
   - Prepare list of fixed asset control by item (sub ledger) and calculate depreciation for monthly & yearly.
   - Make physical count and reconcile with GL and control list.

- Tenacity and enthusiasm to perform the wide variety of tasks necessary at the time of business start-up.

Company Profile:
汤姆工程机械有限公司
----以专业、实力跨出国门,以合作、发展谱写中柬友谊
        本着以发展、弘扬民族工业为已任,促进中柬人民传统友谊,国内知名企业家---中国广西柳州市江航工贸有限公司董事长汤建湘先生于2008年8月在柬埔寨注册成立了汤姆工程机械有限公司。
        汤姆公司位于柬埔寨首都金边市朗哥区卡拉桑池分区120Ｋ号88号西南50米处,在金边市莫尼旺大街53号金边大酒店大堂办公楼一楼设立办事处。公司营运面积超过60亩,房屋建筑物面积达一万平方米,公司设立商品展售区、机械维修区、仓储区、办公区、宿舍区、生活区等,同时,实现了办公信息化,快捷、高效地与国内国际接轨。公司所在该区域区位优势明显,交通物流便利,已被定位为柬埔寨国家重点发展地区,发展前景广阔。目前,公司拥有中籍、柬籍员工30多人。
        公司经营中国柳工品牌工程机械产品,系集整机销售、维修服务、零配件供应、工程机械租赁等为一体的跨国公司。主营各类型号、规格工程机械产品, ：挖掘机.装载机.平地机.推土机.压路机以及各大类别柴油运输机械设备叉车、载货汽车、牵引车、自卸车、仓栏车、厢式车、专用车等。公司依托国际品牌--中国柳工专业技术,风雨兼程,历经六年创业,已发展成为柬埔寨规模最大、品种最全、服务最优的工程机械发展商,产品覆盖整个柬埔寨。在柬埔寨全国重点工程,如斯登沃代水电站、额勒赛水电站、达代河水电站、基里隆水电站等,都使用了汤姆公司产品。与国内知名大企业如中国路桥、中水集团、葛洲坝集团、上海建工集团等建立了良好的合作关系。进驻柬埔寨六年，汤姆公司在企业发展的同时,也为柬埔寨的经济发展做出了突出贡献。
        展望未来,汤姆公司将一如既往地紧跟柬埔寨经济发展的步伐,广交朋友,立足于建立牢固的政经银商人脉,与柬埔寨各界人士、中资机构合力携手合作,汤姆公司将以高素质的员工队伍,现代化的经营管理理念，为市场及客户提供优质产品和优秀服务。汤姆公司有决心、有能力，立志成为中柬经济合作、中柬人民友谊的典范!

Company Profile:
Carter’s is the leading brand of children’s clothing, gifts and accessories in America, selling more than 10 products for every child born in the U.S. Our designs are based on a heritage of quality and innovation that has earned us the trust of generations of families.

We continue this heritage in every little detail to make dressing easier for mom and life more comfortable for babies, and as we move into the future, we are proud to help families like yours with innovative products and new ways to shop for them.

Throughout the years, Carter’s has been known for its thoughtful little details like the Handi-Cuff mitten sleeve that protects babies from self-scratching, and the Jiffon neck design that slips over little ears for easy outfit changes – and although we’ve grown a lot since the early days, we stay true to the philosophy that earned us the trust of generations of families.

Company Profile:
Smart Axiata Co., Ltd., Cambodia’s leading mobile telecommunications operator, currently serves 8 million subscribers under the ‘Smart’ brand. Smart Axiata is part of Axiata Group Berhad, one of Asia’s largest telecommunications groups.

Smart is at the forefront of mobile technology advancement in Cambodia. Smart was the first network to introduce 4G LTE in 2014, 4G+ in 2016 and 4G+ with HD Voice (VoLTE) in early 2017. In mid-2017, Smart introduced cutting-edge 4.5G, manifesting its data leadership position in Cambodia. Smart also provides 2G, 2.5G, 3G and 3.75G mobile services as well as international roaming across more than 190 countries. Its extensive nationwide network coverage stretches to more than 98% of the Cambodian population.

The company is also rapidly transforming itself into a digital lifestyle brand, having introduced many innovative offerings and lifestyle entertainment value propositions. This includes various international partnerships, with brands as diverse as Universal Music, Apple, Facebook and iflix, as well as digital services including SmartLuy, Smart Insurance, SmartPay, Smart Music and SmartNas. Smart aspires to become Cambodia’s Digital Champion, while playing an active role in socio-economic growth.

The company’s workforce consists of more than 1000 local and foreign experts. Smart is committed to its customers, employees and the people of Cambodia, in delivering its promise of enriching their lives through world-class networks, exceptional digital experiences and through significant corporate social responsibility engagements.

job title: មន្រ្តីឥណទានស្ម័គ្រចិត្ត (៥០ នាក់)
position: មន្រ្តីឥណទានស្ម័គ្រចិត្ត (៥០ នាក់)
Location: Battambang，Kampong Cham，Kampong Chhnang，Kampong Speu，Kampong Thom，Kampot，Kandal，Kratie，Phnom Penh，Pursat，Siem Reap
Job Description:
** មន្រ្តីឥណទានស្ម័គ្រចិត្ត (៥០ នាក់) : ភ្នំពេញ កណ្តាល កំពង់ចាម  ក្រចេះ កំពង់ធំ កំពង់ស្ពឺ កណ្តាល កំពត កំពង់ឆ្នាំង ពោធិ៍សាត់ បាត់ដំបង សៀមរាប . 

- ផ្សព្វផ្សាយឱ្យបានទូលំទូលាយនូវផលិតផល និងសេវាកម្មរបស់គ្រឹះស្ថានចំរើន
ដើម្បីទាក់ទាញដៃគូសក្តានុពលទៅតាមតំបន់គោលដៅ 
- សម្របសម្រួលដំណើរការនៃការបញ្ចេញឥណទាន
- សម្របសម្រួលការងារដទៃទៀតតាមការចាត់ចែងរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់ ក្នុងក្របខណ្ឌគ្រឹះស្ថានចំរើន

** អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ 
ចំរើន ផ្តល់ជូននូវប្រាក់ឧបត្ភម្ភលើកទឹកចិត្តប្រចាំខែ ការរៀនសូត្រអំពីការអនុវត្តន៍ការងារជាក់ស្តែង ឱកាសនៃអាជីពការងារលិខិតបញ្ជាក់អំពីបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ។

** របៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ
បេក្ខជន-បេក្ខនារី ដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ និងមានគុណវឌ្ឍិដូចខាងលើ សូមផ្ញើរប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV & Cover letter) មានបិទរូបថតថ្មី ភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនឹងការថតចម្លង លិខិតបញ្ជាក់ការងារ(បើមាន) សៀវភៅគ្រួសារ សំបុត្រកំណើត អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ ប័ណ្ណបើកបររួចផ្ញើមកកាន់ស្នាក់ការចំរើនដែលនៅជិតលោកអ្នក ឬការិយាល័យកណ្តាលដែលមានអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ ផ្ទះលេខ៤២៥ ផ្លូវ២៧១ សង្កាត់ទួលទំពូង២ ខណ្ឌចំការមន រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ ព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជាអ៊ីមែល: job@chamroeun.com 

** ចំរើន ផ្តល់នូវឱកាសស្មើភាពគ្នាក្នុងការប្រកួតប្រជែង ស្ត្រី និងជនពិការត្រូវបានលើកទឹកចិត្តក្នុងការដាក់ពាក្យ មានតែបេក្ខជនដែលជាប់ក្នុងបញ្ជីសម្រាំងប៉ុណ្ណោះនឹងត្រូវទំនាក់ទំនងដើម្បីធ្វើការសម្ភាសន៍ រាល់ប្រវតិ្តរូប និងឯកសារផ្សេងៗដែលបានដាក់មិនត្រូវបានប្រគល់ត្រលប់វិញឡើយ។
Job Requirement:
- ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹងទូទៅចាប់ពីនិស្សិតឆ្នាំទី១ ជំនាញគណនេយ្យ វិទ្យាសាស្រ្តសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងការគ្រប់គ្រងពាណិជ្ជកម្ម ឬជំនាញ ប្រហាក់ប្រហែល
- មានចំណេះដឹងដូចជា៖ លេខនព្វន្ត និងការកត់ត្រាឱ្យមានភាពត្រឹមត្រូវ ភាសាអង់គ្លេស ដែលអាចអានស្តាប់ និងសរសេរបានខ្លះៗ 
- មានប្រវត្តិ និងអត្តចរិតល្អ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ សុភាពរាបសារ មានសុជីវធម៌ល្អ និងមានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការធ្វើការងារជាមួយប្រជាជនក្រីក្រនៅតាមសហគមន៍ 
- ចេះបើកបរម៉ូតូយ៉ាងស្ទាត់ជំនាញ និងមានប័ណ្ណបើកបរម៉ូតូកាន់តែប្រសើរ 
- មានប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងល្អ ចូលចិត្តធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម ជាមនុស្សឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាមនិងមានការប្តេជ្ញាចិត្តខ្ពស់ចំពោះការងារ
Company Profile:
1. VISION:
“A leading Cambodian social microfinance institution working to achieve positive and lasting changes in the livelihoods of economically active poor families in a socially responsible manner”

2. MISSION:
“To improve the livelihoods, skills, and self-confidence of poor families in Cambodia by providing responsible microfinance and complementary socio-economic services”

3. CORE VALUES:
■ INTEGRITY: 
Chamroeun provides financial services and socio-economic services to its clients to enhance their well-being. It achieves this ethically and with transparent, fair, and cost effective methods. This manner is also applied to Chamroeun’s other stakeholders.

■ QUALITY OF SERVICES: 
At Chamroeun, we believe that our clients deserve tailored as well as efficient services. We provide these services in a convenient, proactive, and timely manner.

■ TRANSPARENCY: 
At Chamroeun, we provide our clients and other stakeholders with complete and accurate information about the terms and conditions of our products and services. Information is provided in a user-friendly manner to enable them to easily understand those terms and conditions.

■ FAIR PRACTICES: 
At Chamroeun, we ensure that the services we provide to our clients as well as the interactions we have with other stakeholders are not unethical or deceptive. We are committed to building relationships that are based on respect, fair treatments, and courtesy.

■ CONFIDENTIALITY: 
Privacy of our clients and other stakeholders is strictly safeguarded and stored, and such data is only used upon their consents, and they are well informed on specific purposes of data usage.

■ NON-DISCRIMINATION: 
Chamroeun considers its clients and other stakeholders as value assets and take all of efforts to make sure that the institution treats them in appropriate manner.

job title: មន្រ្តីសម្របសម្រួលសហគមន៍ (៣០ នាក់)
position: មន្រ្តីសម្របសម្រួលសហគមន៍ (៣០ នាក់)
Location: Banteay Meanchey，Battambang，Kampong Cham，Kampong Speu，Kampong Thom，Kandal，Siem Reap，Tboung Khmum
Job Description:
** មន្រ្តីសម្របសម្រួលសហគមន៍ (៣០ នាក់) : កំពង់ចាម ត្បូងឃ្មុំ កណ្តាល កំពង់ស្ពឺ កំពង់ធំ​ បាត់ដំបង សៀមរាប បន្ទាយមានជ័យ

- ផ្តល់ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងប្រឹក្សាយោបល់ផ្នែកអាជីវកម្ម និងសង្គមដល់ដៃគូ
- បញ្ជូនដៃគូដែលប្រឈមបញ្ហាផ្សេងៗផ្នែកសង្គម ទៅស្ថាប័នជំនាញផ្សេងៗ ។ 
- បញ្ចូលទិន្នន័យ PAT របស់ដៃគូ ទៅក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធ WebPAT/Social Management System
- ការរៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ និងសម្របសម្រួលការងារដទៃទៀតតាមការចាត់ចែងរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់ ក្នុងក្របខណ្ឌគ្រឹះស្ថាន

** អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ 
ចំរើន ផ្តល់ជូននូវប្រាក់ឧបត្ភម្ភលើកទឹកចិត្តប្រចាំខែ ការរៀនសូត្រអំពីការអនុវត្តន៍ការងារជាក់ស្តែង ឱកាសនៃអាជីពការងារលិខិតបញ្ជាក់អំពីបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ។

** របៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ
បេក្ខជន-បេក្ខនារី ដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ និងមានគុណវឌ្ឍិដូចខាងលើ សូមផ្ញើរប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV & Cover letter) មានបិទរូបថតថ្មី ភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនឹងការថតចម្លង លិខិតបញ្ជាក់ការងារ(បើមាន) សៀវភៅគ្រួសារ សំបុត្រកំណើត អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ ប័ណ្ណបើកបររួចផ្ញើមកកាន់ស្នាក់ការចំរើនដែលនៅជិតលោកអ្នក ឬការិយាល័យកណ្តាលដែលមានអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ ផ្ទះលេខ៤២៥ ផ្លូវ២៧១ សង្កាត់ទួលទំពូង២ ខណ្ឌចំការមន រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ ព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជាអ៊ីមែល: job@chamroeun.com 

** ចំរើន ផ្តល់នូវឱកាសស្មើភាពគ្នាក្នុងការប្រកួតប្រជែង ស្ត្រី និងជនពិការត្រូវបានលើកទឹកចិត្តក្នុងការដាក់ពាក្យ មានតែបេក្ខជនដែលជាប់ក្នុងបញ្ជីសម្រាំងប៉ុណ្ណោះនឹងត្រូវទំនាក់ទំនងដើម្បីធ្វើការសម្ភាសន៍ រាល់ប្រវតិ្តរូប និងឯកសារផ្សេងៗដែលបានដាក់មិនត្រូវបានប្រគល់ត្រលប់វិញឡើយ។
Job Requirement:
- ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹងទូទៅចាប់ពីកម្រិតបរិញ្ញាបត្ររងឡើង ឬសញ្ញាបត្រមានតម្លៃប្រហាក់ប្រហែលក្នុងជំនាញសង្គមនិងអភិវឌ្ឍន៍ជនបទ ការគ្រប់គ្រងពាណិជ្ជកម្ម ឬជំនាញប្រហាក់ប្រហែល។
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារផ្នែកសង្គមជាមួយអង្គការក្រៅរដ្ឋាភិបាល កាន់តែប្រសើរ
- មានចំណេះដឹងដូចជា៖
- លេខនព្វន្ត និងការកត់ត្រាឱ្យមានភាពត្រឹមត្រូវ
- ភាសាអង់គ្លេស ដែលអាចអាន ស្តាប់ និងសរសេរបានខ្លះៗ 
- ផ្នែកកំព្យួទ័រ (Ms. Word, Excel, Internet, E-mail, Power Point)
- មានប្រវត្តិ និងអត្តចរិតល្អ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ សុភាពរាបសារ មានរូបសម្បតិ្តសមរម្យ មានសុជីវធម៌ល្អ និងមានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការធ្វើការងារជាមួយប្រជាជនក្រីក្រ។
- មានម៉ូតូផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន ចេះជិះម៉ូតូយ៉ាងស្ទាត់ជំនាញ និងមានប័ណ្ណបើកបរម៉ូតូ ។
- មានស្មារតីទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ ដើម្បីអនុវត្តការងារឱ្យសម្រេចបានទៅតាមផែនការ និងទាន់ពេលវេលា ។
Company Profile:
1. VISION:
“A leading Cambodian social microfinance institution working to achieve positive and lasting changes in the livelihoods of economically active poor families in a socially responsible manner”

2. MISSION:
“To improve the livelihoods, skills, and self-confidence of poor families in Cambodia by providing responsible microfinance and complementary socio-economic services”

3. CORE VALUES:
■ INTEGRITY: 
Chamroeun provides financial services and socio-economic services to its clients to enhance their well-being. It achieves this ethically and with transparent, fair, and cost effective methods. This manner is also applied to Chamroeun’s other stakeholders.

■ QUALITY OF SERVICES: 
At Chamroeun, we believe that our clients deserve tailored as well as efficient services. We provide these services in a convenient, proactive, and timely manner.

■ TRANSPARENCY: 
At Chamroeun, we provide our clients and other stakeholders with complete and accurate information about the terms and conditions of our products and services. Information is provided in a user-friendly manner to enable them to easily understand those terms and conditions.

■ FAIR PRACTICES: 
At Chamroeun, we ensure that the services we provide to our clients as well as the interactions we have with other stakeholders are not unethical or deceptive. We are committed to building relationships that are based on respect, fair treatments, and courtesy.

■ CONFIDENTIALITY: 
Privacy of our clients and other stakeholders is strictly safeguarded and stored, and such data is only used upon their consents, and they are well informed on specific purposes of data usage.

■ NON-DISCRIMINATION: 
Chamroeun considers its clients and other stakeholders as value assets and take all of efforts to make sure that the institution treats them in appropriate manner.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. San Chanraksmey  087 255 551 / 070 28 75 75  No.425, St. 271, Sangkat Tour Tom Pong II, Khan Chamkarmon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia  087 255 551 / 070 28 75 75

job title: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន (៥០ នាក់)
position: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន (៥០ នាក់)
Location: Battambang，Kampong Cham，Kampong Chhnang，Kampong Speu，Kampong Thom，Kampot，Kandal，Phnom Penh，Pursat，Siem Reap
Job Description:
*** មន្រ្តីឥណទាន (៥០ នាក់)​ : ភ្នំពេញ កណ្តាល កំពង់ចាម កំពង់ធំ កំពង់ស្ពឺ កណ្តាល កំពត កំពង់ឆ្នាំង ពោធិ៍សាត់ បាត់ដំបង សៀមរាប 

-​ ផ្សព្វផ្សាយឱ្យបានទូលំទូលាយនូវផលិតផល និងសេវាកម្មរបស់
គ្រឹះស្ថានចំរើន ដើម្បីទាក់ទាញដៃគូសក្តានុពលទៅតាមតំបន់គោលដៅរបស់ខ្លួន 
-	 ដំណើរការនៃការបញ្ចេញឥណទាន
-	 ធានាគុណភាពនៃការប្រមូលឥណទានឱ្យបាន ១០០ភាគរយ
-	 ការរៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ និងសម្របសម្រួលការងារដទៃទៀត
តាមការចាត់ចែងរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់ ក្នុងក្របខណ្ឌគ្រឹះស្ថាន ចំរើន

** អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ និងតម្លៃតបស្នង
ចំរើន ផ្តល់ជូននូវប្រាក់បៀវត្សន៍សមរម្យតាមទីផ្សារការងារ ដោយយោងទៅ
លើសមត្ថភាព បទពិសោធន៍ និងទំហំការងារ។ លើសពីនេះទៀត ចំរើន
មានផ្តល់ជូននូវអត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗដូចជា៖ ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សន៍
ប្រចាំឆ្នាំដោយផ្អែកតាមសមិទ្ធផលសម្រេចបាន ការកែប្រែតាមអត្រាអតិផរណា ប្រាក់ខែទី១៣ និង១៤ កម្មវិធីគាំព៌ាសុខភាព ធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់២៤ម៉ោង និងអត្ថប្រយោជន៍ជាច្រើនទៀត។

**​ របៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ
បេក្ខជន-បេក្ខនារី ដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ និងមានគុណវឌ្ឍិដូចខាងលើ សូមផ្ញើរប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV & Cover letter) មានបិទរូបថតថ្មី ភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនឹងការថតចម្លង លិខិតបញ្ជាក់ការងារ(បើមាន) សៀវភៅគ្រួសារ សំបុត្រកំណើត អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ ប័ណ្ណបើកបរ សញ្ញាបត្រដែល
បញ្ជាក់ដោយសាលាខេត្ត-រាជធានីរួចផ្ញើមកកាន់ស្នាក់ការចំរើន
ដែលនៅជិតលោកអ្នក ឬការិយាល័យកណ្តាលដែលមានអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ ផ្ទះលេខ៤២៥ ផ្លូវ២៧១ សង្កាត់ទួលទំពូង២ ខណ្ឌចំការមន រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ ព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជា    អ៊ីមែល: job@chamroeun.com 

**​ ចំរើន ផ្តល់នូវឱកាសស្មើភាពគ្នាក្នុងការប្រកួតប្រជែងស្ត្រី និងជនពិការ
ត្រូវបានលើកទឹកចិត្តក្នុងការដាក់ពាក្យមានតែបេក្ខជនដែលជាប់ក្នុងបញ្ជីសម្រាំងប៉ុណ្ណោះនឹងត្រូវទំនាក់ទំនងដើម្បីធ្វើការសម្ភាសន៍ រាល់ប្រវតិ្តរូប និងឯកសារផ្សេងៗដែលបានដាក់មិនត្រូវបានប្រគល់ត្រលប់វិញឡើយ។
Job Requirement:
-	 ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹងទូទៅចាប់ពីកម្រិតបរិញ្ញាបត្ររងឡើងឬ
សញ្ញាបត្រមានតម្លៃប្រហាក់ប្រហែល ក្នុង ជំនាញគណនេយ្យ វិទ្យាសាស្រ្តសេដ្ឋកិច្ច និងការគ្រប់គ្រងពាណិជ្ជកម្ម ឬជំនាញ ប្រហាក់ប្រហែល
-	 មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារក្នុងវិស័យហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ កាន់តែប្រសើរ
-	 មានចំណេះដឹងដូចជា៖ លេខនព្វន្ត និងការកត់ត្រាឱ្យមាន
ភាពត្រឹមត្រូវ ភាសាអង់គ្លេស ដែលអាចអានស្តាប់ និងសរសេរបានខ្លះៗ 
-	 មានប្រវត្តិ និងអត្តចរិតល្អ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ សុភាពរាបសារ មានសុជីវធម៌ល្អ និងមានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការធ្វើការងារ
ជាមួយប្រជាជនក្រីក្រ មានស្មារតីទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ ដើម្បីអនុវត្តការងារ
ឱ្យសម្រេចបានទៅតាមផែនការ និងទាន់ពេលវេលា 
-	 ចេះបើកបរម៉ូតូយ៉ាងស្ទាត់ជំនាញ និងមានប័ណ្ណបើកបរម៉ូតូ

ឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម  និងមានការប្តេជ្ញាចិត្តខ្ពស់ចំពោះការងារ
Company Profile:
1. VISION:
“A leading Cambodian social microfinance institution working to achieve positive and lasting changes in the livelihoods of economically active poor families in a socially responsible manner”

2. MISSION:
“To improve the livelihoods, skills, and self-confidence of poor families in Cambodia by providing responsible microfinance and complementary socio-economic services”

3. CORE VALUES:
■ INTEGRITY: 
Chamroeun provides financial services and socio-economic services to its clients to enhance their well-being. It achieves this ethically and with transparent, fair, and cost effective methods. This manner is also applied to Chamroeun’s other stakeholders.

■ QUALITY OF SERVICES: 
At Chamroeun, we believe that our clients deserve tailored as well as efficient services. We provide these services in a convenient, proactive, and timely manner.

■ TRANSPARENCY: 
At Chamroeun, we provide our clients and other stakeholders with complete and accurate information about the terms and conditions of our products and services. Information is provided in a user-friendly manner to enable them to easily understand those terms and conditions.

■ FAIR PRACTICES: 
At Chamroeun, we ensure that the services we provide to our clients as well as the interactions we have with other stakeholders are not unethical or deceptive. We are committed to building relationships that are based on respect, fair treatments, and courtesy.

■ CONFIDENTIALITY: 
Privacy of our clients and other stakeholders is strictly safeguarded and stored, and such data is only used upon their consents, and they are well informed on specific purposes of data usage.

■ NON-DISCRIMINATION: 
Chamroeun considers its clients and other stakeholders as value assets and take all of efforts to make sure that the institution treats them in appropriate manner.

Company Profile:
Cambodia Development Economic Skills Organization
- ជាទីប្រជុំក្រុមហ្រ៊ុនចំរុះជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក កម្មករ
- ពិគ្រោះនិង ជួយសំរបសំរួលការងារជូនប្រជាជនកម្ពុជាដើម្បី
ទទួលបានឱកាសការងារត្រឹមត្រូវ សមរម្យ និងឆាប់រហ័ស
- ពិគ្រោះនិងបណ្តុះបណ្តាការងារដើម្បីធ្វើការនៅកម្ពុជា អាស៊ាន ជប៉ុន
វគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាកពិសេសសិក្សាការងារដើម្បីធ្វើជាកម្មសិក្សាបណ្តុះបណ្តាបច្ចេកទេសការងារ
ប្រទេសជប៉ុនរយះពេល៣ឆ្នាំ/ប្រាក់ខែ1500-2500ដុល្លារ! អង្គការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលការងារក្នុងស្រុកនិងក្រៅស្រុកកសាងសមត្ដភាពការងារ និងស្មារតីការងារដើម្បីជួយពលរដ្ឋកម្ពុជាឈោងចាប់ឱកាសការងារ អាស៊ាននិងជប៉ុន ។ មានបើកវគ្គពិសេសគឺ
បណ្តុះបណ្តាលការងារនិងភាសាដើម្បីជួយដល់ យុវជន យុវនារី សិស្ស
និស្សិត កម្មករ កម្មការនី បានទៅសិក្សានិងធ្វើការប្រទេសជប៉ុន។
1. រយះពេលបណ្តុះបណ្តាល( 1-3ខែ)
2. ចុះឈ្មោះពិនិត្យសុខភាពចំណាយអស់​ 50ដុល្លារ
3. កម្មវិធីបណ្តុះបណ្តោះ
- វេនព្រឹក ម៉ោង8-11 - វេនល្ងាច ម៉ោង2-5 - វេនយប់ ម៉ោង6-8
លក្ខ័ខណ្ឌជ្រើសរើស - អាយុ 20 -30 ឆ្នាំ - មានសុខភាពល្អ
- នៅលីវ - ជាពលរដ្ឋខែ្មរ មានអត្តសញ្ញាណបណ្ណ័ និងសៀវភៅគ្រួសារ

Job Description:
I.THE PURPOSE OF THE POSITION
To assist the Area Program Manager in managing Sponsorship Management Project in a way that: 
- Sponsorship services operations are carried out in compliance with World Vision partnership sponsorship standards, sponsorship programming guidelines and World Vision Cambodia (WVC) national sponsorship guidelines/policies.
- Enhances trust and sponsorship integrity through effective communications and meaningful relationships between registered children, their families, communities and sponsors and contributes to the transformation of registered children, their families, communities and sponsors.
II. MAJOR RESPONSIBILITIES
- Ensure sponsorship Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) consistently meet or exceed the partnership standards.
- Assure quality in sponsorship business process.
- Ensure Child Management Standard (CMS) is implemented in compliance with the partnership standard and in a manner of informing programming.
- Promote good understanding of sponsorship for transformation (refer to Sponsorship Basic Training modules).
- Ensure that each child folder is updated, properly filed and stored in a secure place.
- Coordinate new RC / growth to be processed in compliance with WVC Criteria for Registering Children in Sponsorship Program.
- Ensure Child Protection is handled according to Child Protection Policy (CPP) and the communities understand about the CPP.
- Coordinate sponsor visits to take place in line with the partnership standard, required procedures and Child Protection Policy of WVC.
- Assist in the DME (Design, Monitoring and Evaluation) of the Sponsorship Management Project (SMP).
- Ensure child death is handled in line with the partnership standard.
- Ensure that all follow up actions of all audit findings and recommendations on sponsorship are appropriately taken.
- Assist ADP Manager in preparing annual sponsorship operating plan and budget for Sponsorship; and prepare and submit required reports to supervisor and concerned stakeholders.
- Assist ADP Manager in networking with other Sponsorship Agencies/ NGOs working in the same areas.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s degree in Management / Business Administration/English Literature.
- Good understanding of sponsorship business process and Child Protection
- Knowledge of Project design / Analytical skill
- Proficiency in computer—MS Word, MS Excel, and Lotus Notes.
- Effective Communication and Facilitation skills.
- At least 1 – 2 years experiences in sponsorship business or in community development project.
- Experience in working with children in a development context.
- Must be willing to work within a team and Willingness to travel and overnight stay at project sites and they will use own motorbike.
Company Profile: As member of the World Vision International Partnership, World Vision Cambodia (WVC) is a Christian relief and development organization committed to Working with poor communities, focused on children, to transform lives and Cambodian society through Sustainable development.

Company Profile:
Phillip Bank Plc. is a member of PhillipCapital Group which is headquartered in Singapore, and established since 1975. The Group offers a full range of quality and innovative services to retail, corporate and institutional customers and currently operates in over 15 countries including Australia, Cambodia, China (as well as Hong Kong), France, India, Indonesia, Japan, Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand, Turkey, UK, UAE, USA and Vietnam.  

We were established in Cambodia in 2009 under HwangDBS Commercial Bank Plc. and in 2014, PhillipCapital Group bought it over and renamed it as Phillip Bank. In year 2020, the merger between Phillip Bank Plc. and KREDIT Microfinance Institution Plc. concluded successfully and made us one of the largest commercial bank with more than 80 branches in Cambodia.

Employee experience is our priority in Phillip Bank, in the process of achieving our corporate goals, we will put every effort towards our people’s growth. We are proud of our bank’s culture where: We treat our employee as family members; we always strive to meet our customer’s expectation and we believe in benefitting the communities.

Company Profile:
Phillip Bank Plc. is a member of PhillipCapital Group which is headquartered in Singapore, and established since 1975. The Group offers a full range of quality and innovative services to retail, corporate and institutional customers and currently operates in over 15 countries including Australia, Cambodia, China (as well as Hong Kong), France, India, Indonesia, Japan, Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand, Turkey, UK, UAE, USA and Vietnam.  

We were established in Cambodia in 2009 under HwangDBS Commercial Bank Plc. and in 2014, PhillipCapital Group bought it over and renamed it as Phillip Bank. In year 2020, the merger between Phillip Bank Plc. and KREDIT Microfinance Institution Plc. concluded successfully and made us one of the largest commercial bank with more than 80 branches in Cambodia.

Employee experience is our priority in Phillip Bank, in the process of achieving our corporate goals, we will put every effort towards our people’s growth. Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

Company Profile: Huot Sroeng Group (HSG) is a diversified company invested in various business areas including business solutions, consultancy, trading, and retailing. Established in 1991 as a retail shop in agricultural products, HSG has gained its ground and expertise in agricultural machinery trading including tractor, combine harvester, transplanter, excavator, power-tiller, diesel engine, etc. HSG is officially an authorized dealer of Kubota, an international brand leader in agricultural equipment. We are having branches and service centers in many provinces in Cambodia such as Kampong Cham, Tbong Kmom, Kratie, Kampot, Takeo, and more. Job Description:

- Responsible for the RMS System (Recruitment System).
- Design and prepare the candidates sourcing/selection process for executive and non-executive positions. 
- Design and update the questions for interview based on operation requirements.

- Identifying solutions to challenging and complex ER issues and present options and ways forward to management to consider. 
- Other duties assign by HR Manager.
Job Requirement:
1. Male/Female
2. Good motivation, communication, negotiation and interpersonal skills.
3. Be able to work with employees at all level.
4. Degree in general business management.
5. At least 01-02 years of relevant work experience. 
6. Experience with position requirements will be encouraged to apply.

Job Description:
1. Supervise and lead daily operation of creative design team
- Delegate or divide daily works to Creative Design Team
- Follow up and assist team to complete assignment based on work plan and dateline
- Editing design products, artwork corrector
- Communicate with other departments to ensure the smoothly work
- Provide daily report to Creative Design Manager
- Brie collection from customer and brief summarize 
- Lead team to brainstorming the creative idea 
- Research and develop production strategy 
- Creative flair
- Strong visual sense
- Decide on the products if needed before send to clients
- Orient to creative design team about the targeted goal of company should be achieved
2. Provide capacity building 
- Planning to provide capacity building to creative design team and asking for approval from manager and CEO
- Provide capacity building to staffs under the supervision and external if needed
- Mentoring 
- Motivate staffs under supervision
3. Develop strategy of the company related to creative design field
- Provide idea or advise to manager about feature and price related to design fields
- Participate in any meeting if required to develop strategy to achieve company goal, mission and vision
4. Representative of company to discuss with client on creative design fields 
- Being the representative of company in any meeting with clients and partners if required
5. Reporting 	
- Reporting the daily works to manager if needed 
- Provide monthly report to manager
6. Other duties as required
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s degree in a job-related discipline and minimum of three years’ successes experience in design, publications or similar work.
- Knowledge of the equipment, principles and techniques of artistic design and display, as well as current techniques and materials used in graphic illustration.
- Knowledge of printing industry for preparation and layout of artwork for specific printing and bindery requirements.
- Understanding of communications technologies and production, including but not limited to printing, exhibit production, website development and conversion of print material to digital platforms.
- Expertise in using graphics design software (e.g., In Design, Illustrator); desktop publishing software (e.g., Fireworks, Dreamweaver, Photoshop, Flash, QuickTime), MS Office software (Word, PowerPoint, Excel).
- Content management system (Drupal, WordPress) and website maintenance experience preferred.
- Excellent verbal and written communication skills, including proofreading and appropriate style guides. Knowledge of appropriate copyright and trademark use.
- Must be self-driven, demonstrate teamwork and collaboration skills, and have the ability to interface with faculty, staff and students in the liberal arts and the sciences as well as a wide range of creative professionals including photographers, video geographer and graphic designers.
- Excellent organizational and interpersonal skills, including ability to work effectively with a wide- range of constituencies in a diverse community, and ability to meet tight deadlines and work on multiple projects simultaneously while managing competing priorities.
- Experience in copywriting, photography, video production and social media preferred.
- May require evening and weekend hours.

Interested candidates can send their CVs and Cover Letters with current photo of 4x6 to the email as posting to narenkeo168@gmail.com before 5PM on 02nd Feb 2015. 
Women are encouraged to apply .

-	ស្វែងរកនូវពត៌មាន និង វិធីសាស្ត្រយ៉ាងណាក្នុងការទាក់ទាញអតិថិជនសក្ដានុពល។
-	ធ្វើការទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយអតិថិជន និង បំពេញសំណុំបែបបទលើកិច្ចសន្យាប្រើប្រាស់អិនធឺណែត នៅពេលដែលគាត់សម្រេចចិត្តប្រើប្រាស់។
Job Requirement:
•	តម្រូវកាការងារ
-	មានកាយសម្បទាគ្រប់គ្រាន់ មានយានជំនិះផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន ស្គាល់ផ្លូវនៅទីក្រុងភ្នំពេញបានល្អ។
-	មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ក្នុងការទំនាក់ទំនង មានគំនិតក្នុងការផ្ដួចផ្ដើម និងស្រលាញ់ការងាជាអ្នកលក់ និងផ្នែកទីផ្សា មានអាយុចាប់ពី ១៨ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ។
-	ផ្ដល់អទិភាពសម្រាប់អ្នកដែលកំពុងសិក្សានៅមហាវិទ្យាល័យ និងមានចំណេះដឹងខ្លះៗទាក់ទងនឹងអិនធឺ  ណែត
•	អត្តប្រយោជន៍
-	ទទួលបានប្រាក់បៀវត្តន៍ខ្ពស់ ទទូលបានឱកាសក្នុងការពងឹ្រងសម្មតភាពកាងារ បទពិសោធន៍ ចំណេះដឹង ព្រមទាំងទទួលបានឱកាសបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាល
-	សម្រាប់អ្នកដែលធ្វើការបានល្អនឹងទទួលបានលិខិតសរសើរពីក្រុមហ៊ុន និង ឱកាសក្នុងដំណើរកម្សាន្តនានា ដែលក្រុមហ៊ុនបានផ្ដល់ឱ្យ។
-	ទទួលបានឱកាសក្នុងការដំឡើងឋានៈ និងទទួលការងារយ៉ាងពិតប្រាកដ។
មានអត្ថប្រយោជន៏ផ្សេងៗបន្ថែមទៀតយោងតាមគោលការណ៏របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន។

បេក្ខជនដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ក្នុងការដាក់ពាក្យសូមទាក់ទងមកដោយ ផ្ទាល់នៅក្រុមហ៊ុន OPENNET ដោយមានអាស័យដ្នាននៅខាងក្រោមៈ

-	ធ្វើការជម្រុញ និងលើកទឹកចិត្តឱ្យអតិថិជនមកប្រើប្រាស់សេវាអិនធឺណែត។

-	មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ក្នុងការទំនាក់ទំនង មានគំនិតក្នុងការផ្ដួចផ្ដើម និងស្រលាញ់ការងាជាអ្នកលក់ និងផ្នែកទីផ្សា មានអាយុចាប់ពី ១៨ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ។
-	ផ្ដល់អទិភាពសម្រាប់អ្នកដែលកំពុងសិក្សានៅមហាវិទ្យាល័យ និងមានចំណេះដឹងខ្លះៗទាក់ទងនឹងអិនធឺ  ណែត

-	សម្រាប់អ្នកដែលធ្វើការបានល្អនឹងទទួលបានលិខិតសរសើរពីក្រុមហ៊ុន និង ឱកាសក្នុងដំណើរកម្សាន្តនានា ដែលក្រុមហ៊ុនបានផ្ដល់ឱ្យ។

Company Profile:
Cambodia Development Economic Skills Organization
- ជាទីប្រជុំក្រុមហ្រ៊ុនចំរុះជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក កម្មករ
- ពិគ្រោះនិង ជួយសំរបសំរួលការងារជូនប្រជាជនកម្ពុជាដើម្បី
ទទួលបានឱកាសការងារត្រឹមត្រូវ សមរម្យ និងឆាប់រហ័ស
- ពិគ្រោះនិងបណ្តុះបណ្តាការងារដើម្បីធ្វើការនៅកម្ពុជា អាស៊ាន ជប៉ុន
វគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាកពិសេសសិក្សាការងារដើម្បីធ្វើជាកម្មសិក្សាបណ្តុះបណ្តាបច្ចេកទេសការងារ
ប្រទេសជប៉ុនរយះពេល៣ឆ្នាំ/ប្រាក់ខែ1500-2500ដុល្លារ! អង្គការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលការងារក្នុងស្រុកនិងក្រៅស្រុកកសាងសមត្ដភាពការងារ និងស្មារតីការងារដើម្បីជួយពលរដ្ឋកម្ពុជាឈោងចាប់ឱកាសការងារ អាស៊ាននិងជប៉ុន ។ មានបើកវគ្គពិសេសគឺ
បណ្តុះបណ្តាលការងារនិងភាសាដើម្បីជួយដល់ យុវជន យុវនារី សិស្ស
និស្សិត កម្មករ កម្មការនី បានទៅសិក្សានិងធ្វើការប្រទេសជប៉ុន។
1. រយះពេលបណ្តុះបណ្តាល( 1-3ខែ)
2. ចុះឈ្មោះពិនិត្យសុខភាពចំណាយអស់​ 50ដុល្លារ
3. កម្មវិធីបណ្តុះបណ្តោះ
- វេនព្រឹក ម៉ោង8-11 - វេនល្ងាច ម៉ោង2-5 - វេនយប់ ម៉ោង6-8
លក្ខ័ខណ្ឌជ្រើសរើស - អាយុ 20 -30 ឆ្នាំ - មានសុខភាពល្អ
- នៅលីវ - ជាពលរដ្ឋខែ្មរ មានអត្តសញ្ញាណបណ្ណ័ និងសៀវភៅគ្រួសារ

Job Description:
*** ភារកិច្ច និង ការទទួលខុសត្រូវ
- អនុវត្តឱ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ តាមគោលការណ៍ឥណទានរបស់ស្ថាប័ន ។
- អនុវត្តនូវដំណើរការឥណទាន នៅក្នុងតំបន់ទទួលខុសត្រូវរបស់ខ្លួនរួមមាន ការងារ ផ្សព្វផ្សាយ ការបញ្ចេញឥណទាន និងការប្រមូលឥណទានត្រឡប់មកវិញ ។
- រៀបចំបូកសរុបកិច្ចការឥណទានជូនប្រធានដើម្បីពិនិត្យ និងអនុម័តផ្តល់ឥណទាន ។
- ធ្វើការងារផ្សេងទៀតដែលប្រធានបានប្រគល់ឱ្យ ។
- លើកទឹកចិត្ត និងថែរក្សាអតិថិជន ដើម្បីកសាងឱ្យបាននូវអតិថិជនភក្តីភាព។
Job Requirement:
***លក្ខណៈចាំបាច់ត្រូវមាន
- បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់ទុតិយភូមិ ឬ បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រនូវជំនាញដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ ឫ សញ្ញប័ត្រដែលមាន តម្លៃស្មើ
- មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ក្នុងការទំនាក់ទំនងទាំងខាងក្នុង និងខាងក្រៅ
- មានចរឹតស្លូតបូត ស្មោះត្រង់ ព្យាយាម និង អត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ
- ត្រូវមានអាយុចាប់ពី ២០ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ
- មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា និងចេះធ្វើការសម្រេចចិត្ត
- មានមធ្យោបាយប្រើប្រាស់ផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន

** បញ្ជាក់៖​ មាន​រឺគ្មានបទពិសោធក៍អាចដាក់ពាក្យបានដែរ

Company Profile:
Smart Axiata Co., Ltd., Cambodia’s leading mobile telecommunications operator, currently serves 8 million subscribers under the ‘Smart’ brand. Smart Axiata is part of Axiata Group Berhad, one of Asia’s largest telecommunications groups.

Smart is at the forefront of mobile technology advancement in Cambodia. Smart was the first network to introduce 4G LTE in 2014, 4G+ in 2016 and 4G+ with HD Voice (VoLTE) in early 2017. In mid-2017, Smart introduced cutting-edge 4.5G, manifesting its data leadership position in Cambodia. Smart also provides 2G, 2.5G, 3G and 3.75G mobile services as well as international roaming across more than 190 countries. Its extensive nationwide network coverage stretches to more than 98% of the Cambodian population.

The company is also rapidly transforming itself into a digital lifestyle brand, having introduced many innovative offerings and lifestyle entertainment value propositions. This includes various international partnerships, with brands as diverse as Universal Music, Apple, Facebook and iflix, as well as digital services including SmartLuy, Smart Insurance, SmartPay, Smart Music and SmartNas. Smart aspires to become Cambodia’s Digital Champion, while playing an active role in socio-economic growth.

The company’s workforce consists of more than 1000 local and foreign experts. Smart is committed to its customers, employees and the people of Cambodia, in delivering its promise of enriching their lives through world-class networks, exceptional digital experiences and through significant corporate social responsibility engagements.
Contact Info: Contact Information Kanhaly  010202136 No464 A, Monivong Blvd, Sangkat Tonlebasac, Khan Chamkarmoan, Phnom Penh   010202136

Job Description:
Smile Mini Mart is a company experienced in convenience store retailing and we are now expanding our operations.  Our aim is to offer our customers a wide selection of products in a comfortable, clean shopping environment and the highest levels of customer service. Therefore we are seeking suitable candidates that match well with our company values.   

•	Manage HR Unit to ensure that the company’s meets its long-term goal and complied with Cambodian law;
•	Make sure that all the policies and procedures are clear and that all staff understood 
•	Assist in job analysis to ensure staff‘s requirement, role and responsibility are met to need of company
•	Assist in recruitment, payroll, appraisal performance of staff, ensure all forms completed 
•	Conduct new staff orientation to understand about the overall of company.
•	Assist in organize supervisor meeting, training and various event business programs of the company;
•	Process for contract of staffs and trainees with standard format, and in accordance with company’s policies.
•	Manage all personnel files both soft and hard copy to be safety and confidentiality.
•	Issue Uniform, name tag and related documents to new staffs
•	Provide clear record of office staff leave and  store staffs movement.
•	Coordinate staffs schedule with store supervisors or staff if needed
•	Work closely with store supervisors to provide first consultation and solution of any staff issues or concern.
•	Assist to management decision regarding to staff appraisal result
•	Do other task that assigned by HR manager and management.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor Degree in field of human resource or relevant field.
•	Minimum 2 years experience on human resource management with private sector.
•	Good knowledge and skills in personnel management
•	Good interpersonal and analytical skills
•	Willing with advocacy work and dealing with diversity people
•	Excellent written and spoken Khmer and English.

- Perform other duties as assigned.

- Ability to work with mathematical concepts such as probability and statistical inference

- Record daily outsourcing business transaction into QuickBooks
- Make sure the data is completed and accurate  
- Receive payment from client
- Petty cash and bank reconciliation
- Internal payment process
- Assist the team by generating the report to the team
- Paying vendors
- Manage Client accounting database which will be allocated
- Fill all documents in order and ensure the files are kept in a safe order
- Other tasks assigned by the supervisors/manager

* Project Implementing
- Collect staff information and prepare employee file
- Fill documentation in order for each different client
- Check the monthly expense claim from staff to ensure it is accurate and follow the company policy or agreement.
- Prepare and process payroll for employees
- Prepare payment voucher
- Ensure Employment contract and other agreement are signed and file properly
- Ensure the insurance are coverage for employee per company policy
- Calculate OT and other business claims
- Ensure all update information received on time from the client
- Communicate with outsourcing staffs (External)
- Communicate with project supervisor and client 
- Issue monthly invoices to client 
- Follow up the payment
- Calculate salary and benefit tax 
- Process monthly Tax declaration and NSSF
- Other tasks assigned by the supervisors/manager

* Team related work
- Support on administration work
- Train the intern staff if the supervisor has assigned
- Help the team if needed
Job Requirement:
- Graduate of Accountancy from a reputable university
- Very good practical knowledge and experience of QuickBooks
- Very good command of English

PERSONAL CHARACTERISTICS:
- Enjoy with team working
- Good Planning and proactive 
- Good communication 
- Honest, professional
- Happy to learn something new
- Working under pressure and love challenges

Job Description:
*** Position based in Bantey Meanchey or Oddar Meanchey

The Economic Development Facilitator facilitates the implementation of measures in the area of local and regional economic development. He/she also facilitates the institutionalization of business development services (BDS) and other private sector promotion instruments that strengthen the economic development in rural areas. 

*** Main duties of the position include: 
- Facilitate local partners in planning and implementing value chain upgrading measures 
- Assist in identifying needs for business development services and facilitate the market-oriented establishment of demanded services 
- Support organizational development of business associations and other relevant institutions 
- Assess the economic development potential of value chains and sub-sectors, as well as of economic development initiatives
- Identify and promote business opportunities for 
MSME - particularly in the agro-processing sub-sector  
- Assist in identifying the capacity building needs of key players and identify, implement and/or organize capacity building measures 
- Prepare and moderate workshops, seminars, stakeholder meetings as well as training sessions
Job Requirement:
- University degree in socio-economic or rural development studies, business management, or other relevant fields and at least 3 years of relevant working experience
- Proven experience and capacities in the area of private sector promotion, e.g. value chain and MSME development, investment and trade promotion, BDS development  
- Proven experience in facilitating multi-stakeholder dialogue  
- Self-motivated, entrepreneurial, creative, result-oriented and able to work in a team
- Proficient in spoken and written English 
- Experience in facilitating business plan development, as well as experience in the agro-processing subsector are an advantage. 

*** Applicants who meet the requirements should send: 
1. A cover letter briefly describing and justifying how they meet the above mentioned requirements;
2. A half to one page text answering the following question: What are the main constrains for MSME development in rural areas of Cambodia and which promotional instruments are most suitable for fostering rural economic development in the given Cambodian context; 
3. An updated CV (Certificates should not be included with the application)

17000 Siem Reap Angkor

Company Profile:
GIZ is a federally owned enterprise and is supporting the German Government in achieving its objectives in the field of international cooperation for sustainable development. 

For our Social Health Protection Programme (SHPP), we are seeking for a candidate for the position of Junior Advisor for Health Service Delivery (national professional), based in Kampong Thom.

The Cambodian - German Social Health Protection Programme provides technical and financial assistance to the Ministry of Health and other institutions within the framework of the Health Sector Strategic Plan of the Ministry of Health (MoH) and Provincial Health Department (PHD) in Kampong Thom, Kampot and Kep province. The overall objective of the joint programme of German Development Cooperation and the Ministry of Health is that the poor and vulnerable population in Cambodia is healthier and faces less financial burden by using quality health care services.

The health services delivery (HSD) interventions focus on strengthening quality improvement mechanisms within the Cambodian health system by assisting the Ministry of Health to develop policy documents and guidelines for better quality in health care at national and provincial level. The Junior Advisor for HSD will work under the supervision of provincial health manager for coordinating and providing technical advice to counterparts for systematic implementation of quality improvement measures at provincial and health facilities.

Job Description:
We are Japanese Import Export Company,specialized in Japanese food supplies for restaurants, supermarkets, hotels, wholesalers and retailers. Now we are expanding our services including Web Design. Currently, we are seeking for qualified candidate to fulfill the position  Logistics Supervisor & Stock management officer.

(Forwarder, City delivery, Shipping, land transport etc)
