Job Description:
To review, improve and implement Beer Promoter (BP) management strategy in order to achieve effectiveness & efficiency deployment of BPs nationwide.   
-Provide guidance, direction & in field coaching to the BP team to achieve agreed KPI 
-Enforce agreed BP deployment guideline in outlets to improve sales volume and brand image; in the right outlet segment with the right BPs as per brand guidelines.  
-Ensuring commercial department objectives are met at all times with sufficiently motivated & well train BPs. 
-BP operational procedure/manual to be constantly updated to ensure that an effective & consistent system is in place for efficient management of BPs.
-Ensuring that BPs to be well verse in CBL products FAB.

-University degree or Diploma in Sales & Marketing
-5 years working experience in managing a BP team or at least 3 years’ experience in commercial areas with similar industry. 
-Female is encouraged to apply. 
-Good command of spoken & written English
-Computer knowledge (Ms. Office Applications)
-Good interpersonal skills 
-Ability to work long hours, travel on short notices and ability to be on call 24/7

***Note:
-Female only 
-Salary 1,2k-1,5k

Job Description:
•	To provide HR and Admin services for staff management; such as, Recruitment, manpower planning, on-duty schedule, employee relations, policies formulation & implementation.
•	Handling some Public Affair.
•	Monitoring the effectiveness of the staff performance, discipline and appearance, Employment agreement ; also the learning and development
•	Monitoring and audit all the company vehicle Asset.
•	Doing purchasing ,Supplies & Maintenance
•	Monitor the office and the shop; and to ensure the overall efficiency, productivity and cost effectiveness
•	Analyze HR reports and work closely with accounting team
•	To support all the issue related to HR and Admin
•	Continuously develop and revise human resources policy and other regulations on a timely basis to ensure they are reflecting to need and compliance with Cambodian Labor Law.
•	Develop the annual staff capacity building plan by ensuring that each staff has proper job descriptions, job expectations, internal and external training, job sharing, first time orientation, quarterly coaching, mapping staff competency.
•	Manage the HR filings both documents and web-database to ensure that those documents are filed and entried properly and privately.
•	Ensure the accuracy of the salary, compensation, staff’s benefits by reviewing payroll and relevant reports and they are paid promptly.
•	Ensure staffs are working in the safe and positive working environment where there is no discrimination, harassment, violation, office politics and dangers.
•	Become a first contact person for advise staff, managers, and executive committee for some concerns related to personal security, Cambodia Labor Law, labor relation.
Job Requirement:
•	Degree or above in Human Resource Management or Business Administration;
•	3-4 years relevant working experience in HR & Administrative functions. experience in Restaurant is priority
•	Familiar with the Employment Ordinance, Labour Law and other related regulations of Cambodia
•	Well organized with good interpersonal and communication skills;
•	Good command of spoken and written in English and Khmer (Mandarin will be an advantage)
•	Proficient in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, Access….)
•	Strong problem solving skills
•	Patient, able to work under pressure and willing to learn.
•	Reliable and trustworthy person with good communication and interpersonal skills.
Company Profile:
Sushi Tei is one of the largest Japanese restaurant chains in Singapore and Asia, serving up authentic Japanese cuisine to food aficionados. Founded in 1994 with a Japanese as one of the founding members, Sushi Tei aims to offer the most authentic and satisfying experience in Japanese cuisine. Its unique blend of fresh and original dishes combines the best of Japanese authenticity, and as such has become a popular taste across the Asian Pacific region with more than 51 outlets serving up quality Japanese cuisine to customers every day.
   With an unwavering commitment towards quality, Sushi Tei has grown from its humble beginnings in Holland Village in Singapore to an impressive chain of outlets all over the country, and across Australia, China, Indonesia, Malaysia, and Brunai Darussalam, with over 2,000 employees. Sushi Tei is now expanding in Cambodia and this is indisputably the right time to carve your career with us.  We top the people’s choice in Japanese restaurants regularly and we contend for more awards actively.  At all times, we are endeavoring to achieve more success in future, looking at expanding our chain all over the world and gaining global recognition.
   With our rapid growth and expansion, we are seeking dynamic, vibrant, highly enthusiastic & motivated individual to be part of our team. We are welcome those who have a desire and passion for Food & Beverage industry to join us for the following position.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mrs kouch sreytouch  CS Manager 093 33 22 99 Mondial Center 315, Mao Tse Tong Blvd, Sangkat Phsar Damkor,Khan Toul Kork, Phnom Penh, Cambodia  093 33 22 99

Job Description:
- Report for duty on time and in the manner specified-well-groomed and clean uniforms.
- Smoking and the consumption of beverages (alcoholic and non-alcoholic) and food during working hours are strictly prohibited.
- Check crockery and glassware ton ensure that they are clean at all times.
- Greet guests courteously with a friendly smile.
- Refer to senior waiter/waitress if there are complaints or disagreement over food and/or beverage.
- Do not argue with guests or make unnecessary remarks.
- Refill all uses condiments, sauces and hot water for the next shift.
- Check off the food item recorded at the table order chit when the item is served.
- Set up table, clean the chairs and place them properly at the table.
- Always be well groomed and neatly dressed in uniform.
- Hand over a guest’s belongings that are left behind to the Superiors for necessary action.
- Do not frequent the restaurant area either on or off duty unless in proper uniform.
- To perform other duties as assigned.

position: ជាងភ្លើង ( Technician )
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Lay Huot Operation Director 097 8888 776 No 701 AB, Street 93 Monivorng, Sangkat Beoungkok III Khan Chamka morn Phnom Penh, Cambodia  097 8888 776

Job Description:
** Reports To 
- Head Chef and Sous Chef 

** Key Duties & Responsibilities 
- Assist the Head Chef and Sous Chef in managing the Kitchen Operations. 
- Assist the Head Chef and Sous Chef in supervising and training Kitchen Staff. 
- Prepare the food at one of the Maki, Sushi and Sashimi Counters or Cooked food Stations. 
- Check that all meat, seafood, vegetables, fruits and other perishable ingredients are fresh. 
- Ensure that all ingredients, sauces and pre-prepared sauces are sufficient. 
- Ensure that all necessary frozen food items and meat are taken out of the freezer for thawing. 
- Ensure that all work stations are clean, tidy and ready for the start of business day. 
- Ensure hygiene, cleanliness and safety of the Maki, Sushi and Sashimi Counters / Cooked Food Station. 
- Uphold the hygiene standard of ingredient handling and the dished served. 
- Endure that the Kitchen work top, cookers, ovens, grills, utensils, appliances, equipment, seafood tanks and the floor are often cleaned and disinfected. 
- Order and receive ingredients and supplies. Prior to ordering, check the inventory levels of the ingredients and supplies under his/her care before ordering.
Job Requirement:
- Minimum 2 years relevant working experience in F&B Kitchen operations in a supervisory role.
- Be able to prepare and deliver Susi Tei’s dishes in the menu on a consistent basis, according to standards of specifications and quality. 
- Good culinary abilities to train subordinates. 
- Good knowledge of inventory management. 
- Basic command of spoken English and good command of the spoken local languages.

Job Description:
JOB TITLE		: Senior Supervisor – New Business
REPORTING TO	: Head – New Business & Underwriting
DEPARTMENT	 	: Operations & IT
LOCATION		: Phnom Penh

Business Context : 
This role is responsible for managing and leading the New Business Issuance (NBI) in providing new business submissions issues to ensure smooth operations to/from internal stakeholder and that all are done accurately and in compliance with the Company guideline.

Job Responsibilities:
•	Managing new business issuance team, Kofax and Contain Management, and policy delivery team.
•	Arrangement the resource to ensure handling the workload of team e.g. issuance team, contain management, policy delivery. 
•	Provide regular feedbacks to frontline sales team on the quality of submissions. 
•	Coordinating and cooperating with other related sections with PCLA to smoothly solve all underwriting issues. 
•	Taking part in building new business support manual and update regularly when having any changes include 
•	Providing training to NB staff (new and existing) and briefing to staff from other sections as and when required. 
•	Take ownership of the team’s performance, development and ensure their behavior reflects the values of Prudential (Cambodia) Life Assurance PLC
•	Provide leadership and direction to the team and empower staff to achieve their best capability as well as developing and maintaining an open, honest, and satisfying team environment.
•	Performing other tasks as assigned by line manager. 

Key Accountabilities:
1.	Direct report to Head of NBUW
	New business support to run section operations smoothly & effectively
	Other issues: Establish, monitor and building strong new business team, training/coaching juniors, arrangement resources ...
2.	Mainly responsibility on quality, turnaround time and pending ratio of new submissions and accuracy of policy kit contents. 
3.	Provide sound solution on customers and sales’ complaints and any related issues in close consultation with underwriting team.
4.	Ensure all LIS/LIC’s inquiries on NB areas are timely and accurately responded.
Job Requirement:
Key Success Factors:
1.	Qualification: Undergraduate, fluent in English (speaking, reading, writing, and listening) including translating ability.
2.	Experience: 
•	At least 3 years professional experience in similar field. Prior work in life insurance or financial industry or data entry and document fulfillment is strong desirable.
•	Experience in assessment and analytical work is the Plus
•	At least 2 years of supervisory and management experience. 
3.	Knowledge/Skills: 
•	Good computer and MS office knowledge
•	Very good presentation, facilitation, negotiation skills
•	Very good judgment including underwriting knowledge, attention to detail & analytical thinking
•	Very good communication skills & adaptability
•	Customer oriented, Self-starter, passion for success and potentials to grow. 

The Company offers a competitive remuneration package and attractive long term career prospect and a professional, transparent, and exciting environment.

If you’re interested and think you’re the right person, please submit your CV with cover letter and a recent photo (4x6) to HR Department by using the contact detail below:

Company Profile:
Prudential (Cambodia) Life Assurance PLC began operations in Cambodia in January 2013. It is the leading life insurer in Cambodia with more than USD280 million assured and 27,000 policies issued (as at 31 September 2015). One of the first life insurers in Cambodia, Prudential Cambodia is committed to raising the awareness of life insurance among the Cambodian people and helping them protect and secure their financial futures.

Prudential Cambodia is part of UK-based Prudential plc. Founded in 1848, Prudential plc is an international financial services group with significant operations in Asia, the US and the UK. It serves around 25 million insurance customers and have £505 billion of assets under management (as at 30 June 2015). Prudential plc is listed on the stock exchanges in London, Hong Kong, Singapore and New York.

Prudential plc is not affiliated in any manner with Prudential Financial, Inc., a company whose principal place of business is in the United States of America.

JOB TITLE		: Senior Sales Supervisor
REPORTING TO		: Head of Life Insurance Consultant Channel
DEPARTMENT	 	: Sales and Distributions
LOCATION		: Phnom Penh

Job Purpose:
	To supervise the sales progress against targets/objectives set by management team.

Main Tasks & Job Responsibilities:
	Be responsible for the quality of the business being generated 
	Be responsible for the volume of sales and meeting set targets
	Conduct team meeting and provide feedback to sales people on overall performance
	Coaching, training, and mentoring salesforce 
	Provide an escalation point for customer queries and complaints
	Report the overall production and the quality of the work and business

	Supporting
	Provide supports to salesforce, review the process including feedback provided by the salesforce to assess the effectiveness of the current process, and make recommendations for improvement.
	Assist salesforce by answering queries and addressing issues. 
	Build effective relationships both within and outside the department; seek input from and maintain effective ongoing communication with others
	Management: 
	Daily management of the sales people’s including quality, efficiency, and effectiveness
	Demonstrate high level of integrity, courtesy, self discipline, and professionalism
	Be confident and mature with positive attitude
	Be respectful, caring and understanding
	Be able to handle effectively all queries in professional manner

	Has experience and knowledge of management information and the concept of workflow

	Ability to manage and work independently
	Ability to think creatively and initiative
	Analytical skills and demonstrate positive attitude
	Excellent business communication skills, commendable in English language both in speaking and writing.

By providing these services on the same premises as our press and post press procedures we are able to save time and guarantee the quality of prepress processing. We enjoy what we do. There is no greater satisfaction than delivering a finished product that helps a client reach their goals and objectives.

Job Description:
- To perform and implement all customs clearance activities such as following upcoming shipment, documents transactions and day-to-day related activities in accordance with the objectives, policies and procedures.
- To participate in implementing the anticipated plans and programs as per the set goals to ensure internal work development and productivity increase.
- To participate in the development of the customs clearance section's work plan and preparing work schedules and expediting work flow to improve efficiency of the customs clearance section.
- To follow up with operation department and clients for reception of complete set of shipping documents for customs clearance purposes, and ensure its compliance with customs regulations and exemption lists requirements. 
- To coordinate with the clearing agents and prepare supporting documents required for clearance such as shipping guarantees requisitions and ensure on time submittal and follow up for immediate clearance. 
- To follow up with the freight forwarders, couriers and shipping lines for freight quotations and price lists for inbound and outbound shipments. 
- To confirm vessels arrival time to operation department for payment purposes and release payment requisitions for shipments to guarantee availability of shipping documents prior to vessels arrival. 
- To follow up shipments and documents with the freight forwarders and shipping lines. 
- To follow up with the transporter(s) to ensure on time & complete delivery of cleared shipments. 
- To prepare periodic reports with respect to customs clearance section's activities and achievements to be submitted to the Support Services Section Head.
- To verify the delivery of imported product, once cleared, from the sea/air/ land port to our designated plants and/or warehouses.
- To perform other duties related to the job as assigned by the Customs Clearance Section Head.
Job Requirement:
- 2-3 years’ experience preferably within transportation or logistics industry
- Certification in customs clearance
- Decision making  and management skills 
- Supervisory and follow-up skills 
- Problem solving, planning and organizing skills
- Negotiation and communications skills 
- Time management skill
- Interpersonal skill
- Computer skill

Job Description:
Our partner began its commercial activities in Cambodia in May 2012, being the first step of the regional expansion plan. The company has teamed up with Honda NCX to provide financial services to all local Honda customers. Based on this partnership, our company can support the purchase of brand-new motorcycles from its commercial desk in each official Honda retailer. With presence in 44 outlets, covering of the countries’ provinces, the company will soon expand to the rest of the country.Currently, we are seeking for qualified candidate to fill the position  Deputy HR Manager.

+ Responsibilities:
- Maintains the work structure by updating job requirements and job descriptions for all positions.
- Maintains organization staff by establishing a recruiting, testing, and interviewing program; counseling managers on candidate selection; conducting and analyzing exit interviews; recommending changes.
- Prepares employees for assignments by establishing and conducting orientation and training programs.
- Ensures planning, monitoring, and appraisal of employee work results by training to coach and discipline employees; hearing and resolving employee grievances; counseling employees and supervisors.
- Maintains employee benefits programs and informs employees of benefits by studying and assessing benefit needs and trends; recommending benefit programs to management; directing the processing of benefit claims; obtaining and evaluating benefit contract bids; awarding benefit contracts; designing and conducting educational programs on benefit programs.
- Ensures legal compliance by monitoring and implementing applicable human resource federal and state requirements; conducting investigations; maintaining records; representing the organization at hearings.
- Maintains human resource staff by recruiting, selecting, orienting, and training employees.
- Maintains human resource staff job results by counseling and disciplining employees; planning, monitoring, and appraising job results.
- Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.

+ Requirement:
- Degree holder with at least 5 years of relevant experience in Human Resources
- Service-oriented with the ability to interact with all levels of management through excellent presentation and interpersonal skills
- Good command of spoken & written English ( Vietnamese is advantage )
- Excellent negotiation , communication & presentation skill
- Good problem solving , planning & interpersonal skill
- Active , initiative , self-motivated & aggressive
- Calmly, assertive, sociable, good listener.

+ Conditions and Benefits:
- Working Time	8:00Am～17:00PM
- Working Days	Mon / Tue / Wed / Thu / Fri / Sat (Half) / Sat (Full)
- Holiday	Sun / Legal holiday
- Salary	$ 500 ～ $ 700
- Salary around 700$

Job Requirement:
Make a Positive Impression
- Be clean and professional looking.
- Follow dress code and wear your identification badge at all times.
- Greet guests and co-workers with a smile
- Offer to assist customers when a visitor or guest appears to be lost. 

Respect and Caring
- Listen to customers with empathy; be courteous and do not use jargon.
- Keep noise to a minimum; never "talk over" a guest.
- Treat other employees as professionals deserving courtesy, honesty and respect.
- Welcome new employees.
- Knock before entering a guest's room.

Innovation
- Apologize for poor service, and fix what is in your control.
- Identify ways to solve problems.
- Offer suggestions.
- Follow up and follow through to get problems resolved.
- Take a personal interest in meeting the needs of the customers.

Dedication
- Take pride in the organization as if you own it.
- Accept the responsibilities of your job.
- Support your co-workers. Do no chastise or embarrass fellow employees.
- Participate in staff meetings and Medical Center events.
- Be an ambassador for the governor's House.
- Adhere to policies and procedures.
- Arrive to work on time.

Exceptional Service
- Our job is to serve our guests and provide high quality service with care and courtesy.
- Anticipate and exceed all customer expectations: "Go The Extra Mile."
- Demonstrate enthusiasm and a high degree of professionalism while performing your job.
- Make a difference.
- Consider the safety and well being of patients in all actions.

Job Description:
*** ទីតាំងបម្រើការងារៈ	ភំ្នពេញ (៥រូប) និងកំពង់ចាម (៥រូប)

-	 សិក្សា វាយតំលៃ និងប្រមូលព័ត៌មាន នៃតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការសក្កានុពលនិងតំបន់គោលដៅ 
-	 បង្កើនទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយអាជ្ញាធរមូលដ្ឋាន និងអតិថិជន
-	 ផ្សព្វផ្សាយផលិតផលកម្ចី និងសេវាកម្មនានានៃគ្រឹះស្ថានជូនដល់ អតិថិជន និងតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការគោលដៅនិងទាក់ទាញអតិថិជនសក្តានុពល
-	 ពន្យល់ និងផ្សព្វផ្សាយគោលការណ៍ឥណទាន និងនីតិវិធីស្នើ សុំខ្ចីប្រាក់ជូនដល់អ្នកសុំខ្ចី
-	 សិក្សា វាយតម្លៃ និងប្រមូលព័ត៌មាន អ្នកសុំខ្ចី និងបំពេញឯកសារកម្ចីឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ តាមគោលការណ៍និង សេចក្តីណែនាំឥណទាន
-	 សំរេចផែនការ និងបទដ្ឋាននានាដាក់ចេញដោយក្រុមហ៊ុន ដើម្បីអនុវត្ត
-	 តាមដានការប្រើប្រាស់កម្ចីរបស់អិថិជននិងដោះស្រាយកម្ចី យឺតយ៉ាវ ឬស្ថិតក្នុងហានិភ័យ រាយការណ៍ជូនប្រធានក្រុមឥណទាន ឬនាយកសាខា
-	 ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ជូនប្រធានក្រុមឥណទាន ឬនាយកសាខា
Job Requirement:
-	 មានកម្រិតបរិញ្ញាបត្ររង ឬបរិញ្ញាបត្រជំនាញ ធនាគារ និង ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ គ្រប់គ្រងទូទៅ ឬសញ្ញាប័ត្រពាណិជ្ជកម្មមានលក្ខណៈ ប្រហាក់ប្រហែល
-	 មានជំនាញដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា ការគិតទុកជាមុន និង មានគំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើម 
-	 ទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ ស្មោះត្រង់ និងមានការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់

job title: ប្រធានសាខា
position: ប្រធានសាខា
Job Description:
-	 ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងវាយតម្លៃកម្ចីដល់ទីតាំងអតិថិជន(ទីកន្លែងធ្វើជំនួញ) និងការបំពេញឯកសារកម្ចី ដែលធ្វើដោយមន្ត្រីឥណទាន។  
-	 ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងគ្រប់គ្រងដំណើរការ នៃការផ្តល់កម្ចី  ប្រមូលកម្ចី និងការដោះស្រាយកម្ចីរបស់មន្ត្រីឥណទាន។
-	 ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងធ្វើផែនការដាក់កម្ចី(លក់) ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ប្រចាំខែ សប្តាហ៍ របស់មន្ត្រីឥណទាន។
-	 សិក្សា វាយតំលៃ និងប្រមូលព័ត៌មានតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការសក្កានុពល និងតំបន់គោលដៅ
-	 គ្រប់គ្រងគុណភាពផលប័ត្រកម្ចី និងចូលរួមដោះស្រាយកម្ចីដែល មានបញ្ហា
-	 ថែរក្សាអតិថិជន ចំណែកទីផ្សារ និងផ្តល់សេវាកម្មល្អជូនអតិថិជន
-	 ផ្តល់ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលជាប្រចាំពីគោលការណ៍ឥណទានដល់ បុគ្គលិកដែលគ្រប់គ្រង និងគ្រប់គ្រងតាមដាន ជំរុញនិងគាំទ្រការអនុវត្តន៍ ការងារបុគ្គលិក។
-	 ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ជូនប្រធានផ្ទាល់នូវលទ្ធផលការងារ និងបញ្ហានានា
Job Requirement:
-	 មានកម្រិតបរិញ្ញាប័ត្រជំនាញ ធនាគារ និងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ គ្រប់គ្រងទូទៅ ឬសញ្ញាប័ត្រពាណិជ្ជកម្មមានលក្ខណៈប្រហាក់ប្រហែល
-	 មានបទពិសោធន៍ក្នុងការផ្តល់ឥណទានយ៉ាងតិច៣ឆ្នាំក្នុងវិស័យមីក្រូ ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ឬធនាគារ
-	 មានចំណេះដឹង ក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រង និងដឹកនាំ
-	 មានជំនាញដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា ការគិតទុកជាមុន និងមានគំនិត ផ្តួចផ្តើម 
-	 ទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ រួសរាយរាក់រាក់ ស្មោះត្រង់ និង មានការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់
-	 មានឆន្ទៈទៅបម្រើការងារនៅតាមខេត្ត ឬតំបន់ទីជនបទ។

*** បេក្ខជនដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមដាក់ពាក្យសុំបម្រើការងារ និងប្រវតិ្តរូបសង្ខេបមកកាន់អាសយដ្ឋានផ្ទះលេខ២៤៣-២៤៤ ផ្លូវ៥៩៨ សង្កាត់ទួលសង្កែ ខណ្ឌប្ញស្សីកែវ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ ឬ អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ simphalla210113@yahoo.com ទូរស័ព្ទ៖០១៧ ៦៦៦ ៦៦៨ ។

position: បច្ចេកទេសកសិកម្ម
Job Description:
-	 បង្រៀនបច្ចេទេស តាមដានការដាំដុះ និងរៀបចំផែនការដាំដុះដើម្បីអោយដៃគូសហការណ៏អនុវត្តន៍
-	 ធ្វើការទំនាក់ទំនង ព្រមទាំងតាមដានជាមួយដេប៉ូ និងអតិថិជនក្នុងការលក់ផលិតផល និង សម្ភារៈកសិកម្ម
-	 រៀចំផែនការលក់ និងសិក្សាទីផ្សារប្រកួតប្រជែងតាមតំបន់គោលដៅរបស់ខ្លួន
-	 ត្រូវប្រឹក្សាបច្ចេកទេសដល់គ្រប់ស្ថាប័នដែលជាដៃគូសហការណ៏
Job Requirement:
-	 មានសញ្ញាប័ត្រផ្នែកក្សេត្រសាស្ត្រ ឬសាកវប្បកម្ម
-	 មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច ១ - ២ឆ្នាំ និងមានឆន្ទៈធ្វើការងារជាមួយកសិករ និងដៃគូផ្សេងៗ
-	 ចេះបច្ចេកទេសក្នុងការដាំដុះដំណាំបន្លែ និងឈើហូបផ្លៃ ព្រមទាំងចេះដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាក្នុងការដាំដុះ
- 	ចេះទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយកសិករ ដៃគូផ្សេងៗ និងអាជ្ញាធរមូលដ្ឋាន
-	 ចេះអត់ធ្មត់ និងស្មោះត្រង់

** ការទទួលពាក្យ
- 	បេក្ខជន បេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៏សូមផ្ញើរ CV & Cover Letter ចាប់ពីថ្ងៃនេះតទៅ តាមរយៈអ៊ីម៉ែលៈ aspkhmer@gmail.com ឬទំនាក់ទំនងតាមរយៈលេខទូរសព្ទ 088 555 3313, 012 995 856, 086/11 22 03 85
- 	ប្រាក់ខែក្រុមហ៊ុនផ្តល់ជូនតាម បទពិសោធន៏ការងារ ឬអាចចរចារគ្នាបានពេលសម្ភាសន៍។
- 	ថ្ងៃផុតទទួលពាក្យគឺថ្ងៃទី២ ខែកុម្ភះ ២០១៥

Job Description:
Engility/IRG is soliciting expressions of interest and resumes for Senior Technical and Management Specialists for an anticipated project focused on increasing the capacity and productivity of agriculture value chain actors and promoting biodiversity and climate smart practices in the Tonle Sap region. Please note that all positions are subject to the successful award of the project.

Engility/IRG has 35 years of experience assisting governments, communities, and the private sector to manage their environment and natural resources and to deliver innovative, breakthrough solutions in key development sectors including agriculture, climate change, food security, biodiversity, forestry, protected areas management, community engagement, disaster risk reduction, renewable energy, and institutional capacity building. 

We are currently recruiting for Technical Specialists with expertise in the following areas:

•	Rice Value Chain 
•	Horticulture Value Chain 
•	Fisheries Value Chain 
•	Agronomist 
•	Aquaculture
•	Nutrition
•	Gender
•	Climate Smart Agriculture
•	Biodiversity   
•	Water Management & Irrigation
•	Natural Resource Management
•	Agriculture Finance 


We are currently recruiting for Management Specialists for the following positions:

•	Deputy Chief of Party
•	Monitoring and Evaluation Manager
•	Director of Finance and Administration
•	Grants Manager




Qualifications for Technical and Management Specialists: 7+ years of progressive experience managing donor-funded projects in a similar role; Advanced degree in a relevant field preferred, Bachelor’s degree and additional experience accepted; USAID project experience required; Previous personnel management experience; Fluency in English, written and spoken, required.

To apply: Please send your CV and any supporting documents to cambodia.experts@EngilityCorp.com. Please include the desired position in the subject line of your email. Only applications submitted in English will be considered.

To learn more about International Development at Engility please visit http://www.engilitycorp.com/service-offerings/specialized-technical-consulting/international-development
Job Requirement: Qualifications for Technical and Management Specialists: 7+ years of progressive experience managing donor-funded projects in a similar role; Advanced degree in a relevant field preferred, Bachelor’s degree and additional experience accepted; USAID project experience required; Previous personnel management experience; Fluency in English, written and spoken, required.

Company Profile:
As Cambodia’s longest-serving and only 100% locally owned mobile communications company, Cellcard has more than 24 years of service to the Kingdom maintaining a customer base of more than 4 million subscribers.

Cellcard launched in 1997 in a joint venture with Millicom International Cellular providing its customers with the first prepaid service with scratchcards.

What followed for Cellcard was a number of firsts in the market such as introducing SMS, Value-Added Services, a dedicated Loyalty program, roaming services and a credit sharing platform.

Cellcard is Cambodia’s most-awarded mobile network having achieved more than 30 industry awards for network excellence including an impressive six consecutive Ookla Speedtest awards and a number of category wins from Opensignal including Best Games Experience in February 2020.

It’s most recent market firsts include the Cellcard Network Guarantee launched in 2017 reimbursing any customer who experiences a dropped call, the award-winning App-based Super Data Race held each year since 2017 and its move to lead the esports agenda in 2018 followed in 2019 with Cambodia’s first virtual gamer platform PlayGame and the first tailormade gamer data plan PlayGame Unlimited.

In February 2021, Cellcard revealed its latest innovation, the Pouk Mak chat app, the world’s first major Khmer languaged messaging App.

A major focus for Cellcard now is its evolution to 5G for consumers and enterprise, including Smart City applications across Fintech and web security, data privacy, public safety and security, environment protection, education, healthcare and e-government.

In terms of 5G network readiness, Cellcard has conducted numerous live tests on its stand-alone site reaching speeds of 1.8 gigabytes per second. These are Cambodia’s first and only tests conducted on a real end-to-end with 5G radio to a 5G core network able to accommodate network slicing for dedicated use cases.
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruitment Team  017 333 589 | 077 906 555 | 077 907 555 No. 33 Preah Sihanouk Blvd., Phnom Penh  017 333 589 | 077 906 555 | 077 907 555

Welcome to Angkor Mithona Restaurant 

Angkor Mithona Restaurant is located in the heart of Phnom Penh city of Kingdom of Cambodia, approximately between 20 to 25 minutes drives from the Phnom Penh International Airport. For budget travelers or those who want to enjoy the warm, friendly hospitality that comes from staying in a Khmer bed and breakfast lodge - the Angkor Mithona is for you. The guesthouse is perfect for budget-minded holidaymakers seeking comfortable, clean and safe accommodation close to Phnom Penh city’s attractions, activities and shops such as the Royal Palace, Wat Phnom, Central Market, Russian Market and the National Artifacts Museum. Position: Fix Asset Controller

Job Description: 
1.Create and monitor a system of controls, procedures, and forms for the recordation of fixed assets.
2.Recommend to management any updates to accounting policies related to fixed assets.
3.Assign tag numbers to fixed assets.
4.Record fixed asset acquisitions and dispositions in the accounting system.
5.Track the compilation of project costs into fixed asset accounts, and close out those accounts once the related projects have been completed.
6.Reconcile the balance in the fixed asset subsidiary ledger to the summary-level account in the general ledger.
7.Calculate depreciation for all fixed assets.
8.Review and update the detailed schedule of fixed assets and accumulated depreciation.
9.Calculate asset retirement obligations for those fixed assets to which AROs are applicable.
10.Investigate the potential obsolescence of fixed assets.
11.Conduct periodic impairment reviews for intangible assets.
12.Conduct periodic physical inventory counts of fixed assets.
13.Recommend to management whether fixed assets should be disposed of.
14.Conduct analyses related to fixed assets as requested by management.
15.Prepare audit schedules relating to fixed assets, and assist the auditors in their inquiries.
16.Prepare property tax returns.
17.Other job assigned by management
Job Requirement:
Job Requirement:
-Male/Female
-Bachelor Degree in Accounting/Management
-At least 1 year experience in related file or accounting  
-Honesty and integrity 
-Flexible and team work
-Be able to work under pressure.

Benefit: a very completive salary offered upon the experience and knowledge. It should be negotiable.

Working Time: 8.00am-17.00pm, (Saturday half), public holiday 

HOW TO APPLY:
Interested candidate can submit a cover letter with expected salary and CV with current photo (4 X 6), not later than February 28, 2015 to email or through the address below.

job title: Project Coordinator for Flood School Safe $492 - $615
position: Project Coordinator for Flood School Safe $492 - $615
Job Description:
I. THE PURPOSE OF THE POSITION:
To assist the ADP (Area Development Program) manager in planning, implementing, monitoring and evaluating 1 or more sector projects that are contributing to program objectives in a coordinated way. To ensure the project promotes quality, empowering and sustainable development, in close collaboration with TDFs (Transformational Development Facilitators) 

II. MAJOR RESPONSIBILITIES:
- Promote community level analysis and planning, with TDF support, and integrate these into project designs and annual plans.
- Facilitate assess community level to develop detail implementation plan of flood safe school project.
- Revise plans in response to reflection and learning from the community and the ADP Team.
- Prepare and revise annual budgets and Manage and report on the budget according to donor guidelines.
- Ensure gender analysis, Christ-centered commitment, and child protection is integrated into planning and implementation of projects.
- Coordinate with TDFs to ensure and support project implementation that promotes transformational development.
- Monitor project activities and outputs to ensure accountability and achievement of outcomes.
- Ensure the community is involved in all stages of monitoring and evaluation.
- Participate in practitioner networks / working groups, as agreed with the ADP manager, to ensure ongoing learning on good practices & sectoral standards relevant to assigned projects.
- Actively participate as an ADP Team member in learning, training and spiritual nurture.
- Support the TDFs in building community capacities for transformational development.
Job Requirement:
- Must understand and agree with WV’s vision, mission and core values.
- University degree is in Education is prefer. 
- Minimum 2 years of appropriate professional experience in education field and community development.
- Sound experience in project design, implementation, monitoring, evaluation, and report writing
- Previous experience in advocacy and networking in an advantage
- Competent in written English communication and Computer literate; Microsoft Word and Excel.
- Must be willing to work within a team and Willingness to travel and overnight stay at project sites. 
- They will use own motorbike. 
INSTRUCTIONS
Company Profile: As member of the World Vision International Partnership, World Vision Cambodia (WVC) is a Christian relief and development organization committed to Working with poor communities, focused on children, to transform lives and Cambodian society through Sustainable development.

Job Description:
Our client is one of the private Microfinance and was established as a credit unit of the Federation of Cambodian Rice Millers Associations to alleviate the capital constraints of rice mill entrepreneurs who lacked access to credit to expand their production. Currently, we are seeking for qualified candidate to fill the position Loan Compliance Officer. 

 +Responsibilities: 

- Regularly monitor and assist branches in their compliance to the Company’s credit policy, procedures, guidelines, operational plan and other related documents.
- Support branches in operational matters, answer branch requests and questions.
- Intervene in field tasks directly as prescribed by credit policy and procedures, e.g. participation in loan assessment.
- Contribute to the review and improvement of credit policy, procedures, guidelines, forms and other related documents; prepare and disseminate Company resolutions and memos to the branches accordingly.

Risk Control Function
- Identify and monitor risks in the loan portfolio and in the credit function.
- Propose and implement mitigation solutions to credit risk.
- Help branches safeguard a good loan portfolio quality, including field staff training, on-site inspection and follow-up, watching out for early warning signs and assistance in the recovery of problem loans.

Other Functions
- Perform business research and analysis as required.
- Contribute to cross-functional issues as required in cooperation with other Company Departments.
- Build and maintain good reputation and relationship with all operational stakeholders, including clients, local authorities, the courts, other microfinance institutions and others.
- Other duties related with the position and that may be assigned from time to time.


 +Requirement: 

- Bachedor Degree in Business Administration, Accounting or related field
- At least two year of practical microfinance or banking experience in credit management.
- Strong commitment to work, able to perform multitasks within tough deadlines, ready to work occasionally overtime and to travel to the provinces.

 +Conditions and Benefits:

- Working time: 7:30am-12:00am | 1:00pm-5:00pm
- Working days: Monday-Friday
- Holidays: Saturday, Sunday & Legal Holidays
- Khmer New Year and Pchumbend Bonus (50% of gross salary).
- Annual Incentive
- Annual Provident Fund
- 24-hour insurance.
- Salary range: $300-$350

job title: 1044_Sea Freight & Air Freight Logistic Sales Manager
position: 1044_Sea Freight & Air Freight Logistic Sales Manager
Job Description:
Our client is a young company with a long history - in 2010 We grew out of a local logistics company founded in the early 1980’s. Under the same experienced management, We aims to offer more customized and specialized services to their customers around the world.

With our roots in the emerging markets, We brings efficiency to supply chains in some of the worlds most challenging environments, offering overall personal service and customized capabilities in developed countries and emerging economies.
Our vision: to be a new type of personalized logistic company meeting the global trade challenges of tomorrow
Our mission: to provide trade through sustainable logistic solutions as a one-stop service partner
Our values: high standard, personal ownership, teamwork and excellent service. So we are hiring Sea Freight & Air Freight Logistic Sales Manager

+ Responsibilities :	

• Responsible for generating the sales revenues from air Freight and sea freight service.
• Establish sales objective and develop annual sales plan
• Initiate market study to penetrate new customer for business expansion
• Responsible for sales management including : air transport , Ocean transport, domestic transport, logistic service ( warehouse/ distribution)
• Responsible for projecting the expected sales volume and profit for existing and new client.
• Deal with internal/external business group, relevant agents, airline, sea liner, for latest update for coordinating the pricing, issuing quotation to customer.
• Develop comprehensive pricing strategies for service contracts to enhance to closure of business deals.
• Responsible and follow up sales inquiries with internal/ external customers to obtain the latest business information.
• Responsible for building good business relationship with existing and new client by conducting sales call, visit and meeting.
• Identify, Position and expand opportunities for domestic and international freight service
• Overlook the sales and marketing activities for create strong brand awareness in the market
• Contact customer when service issue may effect delivery commitment and understanding customer’s need in order to recommend appropriate solution.
• Cooperate between customer and operation team in case of mis- handing happens
• Follow up and chase for the outstanding in cases customer is having financial issue.
• Act as the receive party for customer’s complaint, investigating and coordinating with the relevant party / operation to resolve issue.
• Pacify the customer whenever there is a service difficulty, such as in case of the cargo delay and changing of the schedules.
• Work closely with other department to support smooth business operation.
• Others responsible as assignment by Management team.

+ Requirements:

• Cambodia nationality, Bachelor or Master in Logistic, Sales, Business admin or related.
• at least 3-5 years of sale experience in sea freight/ air freight within logistic service provider business.
• Extensive knowledge of freight forwarding business, supply chain management, logistic and market/ industries.
• Experience of dealing and good connection with airline and sea liners for pricing practices
• Good command of English with persuasive negotiation and presentation skill.
• Reliable leadership skill and good team player
• Analytical/ logical thinking with ability to analyze feasibility and option.
• Result oriented with ability to prioritize urgency and time frame.
• Reliable working attitude with ability to work under pressure.
• Can use PC skills like : Word / Excel / Outlook / PowerPoint.

+ Conditions and benefits:

- Salary : $1000~up
- Working Day : Mon / Tue / Wed / Thu / Fri / Sat (Half)
- Working Time: 8.00～5.00PM 
- Holiday : Sat (Half) / Sun / Legal holiday
- And Other benefit...

Job Description:
Our client is micro finance was granted its license on 23rd April 2009 by the National Bank of Cambodia, and became the first financial institution specialized in housing finance in Cambodia. The company is focused on providing a long-term Home Loan and medium-term Home Improvement Loans to underserved low-middle income Cambodian households who do not have access to formal commercial lending. Geographically, we are currently operating in Phnom Penh city, Siem Reap and Battambang Province; however we have plans to expand to additional provinces in the next few years.Now we are hiring  	Loan Recovery Officers (In Siem Reap Province)

+ Responsibilities :

- Communicate with debtors, local authorities, and lawyer for bad debt collection
- In coordination with other departments, conduct regular follow up with clients through phone calls, home visit, or written correspondences
- Prepare regular reports on status of collection, home/customer visits
- Communicate with company’s lawyer and prepare necessary legal documents for court process in the event of serious default
- Develop effective payment plan and manage files of written off loans
- Accurately input and interpret information collected	

+ Requirements:

- Debt recovery or collection experience with MFI/Banking industry
- Familiar with Cambodian law and complaint filing procedure
- Strong planning, interpersonal, and problem-solving skills

+ Conditions and benefits:

- Salary : $ 180 - $ 250
- Working Day : Monday - Saturday 
- Working Time : 8:00am～12:00am | 1:00pm～5:00pm

- Bonus

Job Description:
Our client is an enterprise created to incorporate its branded chain of subsidiaries including supermarket, Quick Service Restaurants and Guardian.Currently, we are looking for the potential candidate to fulfill the position of Category Manager (Health).

+ Responsibilities :
1.Sales Generation
-  Generate sales by ensuring that the Guardian target customers are provided with the products and services that they want.
- Seek innovative products sourced throughout the world to provide newness, differentiation and interest in the Guardian offer.
- Develop attractive and interesting promotional events which follow pre agreed selling plan
- Work closely with retail and sales management to ensure that store layouts. Promotions and display techniques are effective in maximizing sales and profit from the specific merchandise categories.
- Keep abreast of retail environment by paying regular visits to stores and competitors and take appropriate action to ensure competitive advantage is maintained.
- Develop cataloguing matrix to ensure that varying customers’ needs are satisfied in different localities. 

2.Profit Generation
- Establish and maintain effective margin and price controls which maximize business profits whilst delivering a good value offer to the customer.
- Negotiate and work with vendors to build mutually beneficial relationships to ensure long term strategic partnership, leading to lower costs and higher margin.
- Maximize profit by utilizing category management techniques to manage assortments, pricing and promotion.

3.Stock Control
- Manage stock levels and mark-downs to ensure that product availability is high yet ensure that cash flows is maximized controlling stock levels in both warehouse and stores within set targets.
- Establish and maintain effective SKU control.

4.Supplier Management
Develop and manage strategic partnerships with key suppliers to create win-win strategic relationships.
5.System and People
- Actively exploit benefits of new merchandise management system ensuring sales, profit and costs are effectively managed.
- Develop and train Subordinates ensuring that they are customer and product focused
- Manage performance through the setting and reviewing of individual’s performance
- Build an effective and open working relationship both within the Merchandise Department and with other Departments.
- Assert a high level of administrative control to ensure the smooth running of the specific Merchandise Department.

6.Decision Making Authority:
- Buying for responsible categories
- Vendor negotiations on margin, promotions and listings
= Retail pricing
- In-store display for relevant categories

7.Major Problems/Challenges:
- The successful implementation and use of new merchandise system.
- Understanding category management approach to buying

+ Requirements:
- Bachelor degree in Pharmacy or other relevant fields
- At least 1 year experience in pharmacy
- Passionate, energetic and action orientated
- Influencing skills, analytically, customer centered, open to change, well planned
- Strong sourcing networking and strong contractual management

+ Conditions and benefits:
- Working Time	8:00am～12:00am | 1:00pm～5:00pm
- Working Days	Mon / Tue / Wed / Thu / Fri / Sat (Half) / Legal holiday
- Holiday	Sat (Half) / Sun
- Salary	$ 1200 ～ $ 2000

Job Description:
You will create the first service impression of the company to our clients with the mission to deliver consistent high level of client service for both new and existing client. The task requires you to attend to client’s enquires on products and services (both phone call and walk in) and to successfully introduce relevant products and services to clients within a short window frame of interaction with them.

You will also assist in the expansion and retention of the retail business through providing excellent client service to walk in and potential clients. Handling client’s feedback and performing service recovery is a major part of the scope.
Job Requirement:
•	Minimum Diploma and above or equivalent qualification in any discipline 
•	No experience required for entry level
•	For Senior role, candidates must have at least 2 years of working experience in client service or call centre environment
•	Candidates with experience in performing service recovery and Client feedback handling will be preferred for senior role
•	Excellent interpersonal and communication skills with proficiency in English is essential
•	Proficiency to speak Mandarin or other foreign languages will be an added advantage
•	Client centric with a passion to go the extra mile for clients
•	Pro-active individual who is resourceful to provide alternative solutions for clients
•	A committed and confident team player with the ability to respond positively to client’s request for assistance. 

Interested applicants can send their resume to hr@oneasiacapital.com
Company Profile: One Asia Capital was established and set up by a group of professionals that specializes in financial market, and it has established itself as a commission house for online trading services in the Foreign Exchange, Futures and Commodities market in Cambodia and beyond. Job Description:
You will participate in the development and expansion of One Asia Capital’s business activities for the country wide, assisting the Head of Department in implementing business development strategies for the region.
You are required to engage in client acquisition activities through follow up on referred leads, events participation, networking and implementing other expansion strategies.  You will also assist in the follow up with existing individual and institution clients to provide timely personalised support to meet the clients’ trading needs.  In addition, you will be involved in projects which will contribute to the overall development of business from the region.
Job Requirement:
•	Minimum Degree and above or equivalent qualification in any discipline
•	Prior experience in the financial sales with Derivatives and Currency industry will be an advantage
•	Effectively bilingual with a good command of spoken English is essential
•	Proficiency to speak Mandarin or other foreign languages will be an added advantage
•	Excellent planning and organisational skills is required
•	Client centric with a passion to go the extra mile for clients 
•	Self-motivated individual who is able to multi-task, and stay focus on business objectives 
•	A committed and confident team player with the ability to respond positively to request for assistance.

Interested applicants can send their resumes to hr@oneasiacapital.com
Company Profile: One Asia Capital was established and set up by a group of professionals that specializes in financial market, and it has established itself as a commission house for online trading services in the Foreign Exchange, Futures and Commodities market in Cambodia and beyond. One Asia Capital represents itself as one of the pioneers and innovator of the retail Foreign Exchange and Commodities Exchange industry.

Job Description:
We are looking for a pro-active and self-starter who possesses the drive and determination to succeed in this dynamic financial industry as Account Executive (Futures Broker Representative). This fully commissioned job requires you to acquire new clients and provide consultative selling to meet their needs so as to maintain long term relationships. 

You are also required to provide on-going after sales care by attending promptly to your clients’ enquiries on products and services as well as to maintain an active monitoring of your clients’ trading activities or information to assess their needs and provide the required solutions and support. 

If you have an entrepreneurial mind and if you would like to establish a business to earn an income that commensurate with your efforts, join us as Account Executive. Start your challenging career via sending your resume to hr@oneasiacapital.com
Responsibilities:
•	Consultative selling to meet customer's needs, you will be pro-active to build and manage long-term customer relationships as well as provide good after-sales service
•	Facilitate prospects in account opening process, trading system demonstration and products recommendation
•	Attending to queries on products and services to existing customers
•	Get feedback from customers and prospects for enhancement of product/platforms/services
•	Increase the client base/higher client acquisition rate
•	Active monitoring of existing clients/dormant clients’ activity/information to assess their needs and provide solution/support required to increase their trading activities.
Job Requirement:
•	Minimum Diploma and above or equivalent qualification preferably in the discipline of Finance 
•	Preferably 1 year of experience in related industry, but fresh graduates are also welcomed to apply 
•	An entrepreneurial performer who possesses strong interest in Derivatives and Currency industry 
•	Demonstrates high level of energy and positive working attitude who have a passion to do sales 
•	Selected candidates are required to pass recruitment assortment and training
•	Age 21 years and above.

Only shortlisted candidates will be notified.
Company Profile: One Asia Capital was established and set up by a group of professionals that specializes in financial market, and it has established itself as a commission house for online trading services in the Foreign Exchange, Futures and Commodities market in Cambodia and beyond. One Asia Capital represents itself as one of the pioneers and innovator of the retail Foreign Exchange and Commodities Exchange industry.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  023 99 77 97  Vattanac Capital Tower Level 7 66 Monivong Blvd. Phnom Penh Cambodia  023 99 77 97

Job Description:
JOB TITLE		: Life Insurance Specialist
REPORTING TO	: Senior Sales Supervisor
DEPARTMENT	 	: Sales and Distributions
LOCATION	: Phnom Penh, Sa’ang, Koh Kong, Kg. Thom, Siem Reap, Pursat, Takeo, and Pailin

Job Responsibilities:
	Approach potential customers from the customer contact list and referrals provided by a distribution partner 
	Present and provide consultation with regards to the life insurance products to all prospected customers and then sell the products as per the needs of such customers
	Assist the customers by providing them after sales service and information as and when required by such customers 
	Work with the Senior Sales Supervisor in providing the regular sales reports as per the Company policies
	Perform other tasks as required by Supervisor.
Job Requirement:
Key Success Factors:
	Graduates, from University/College, an advantage. 
	Fresh graduates with high academic credentials shall be considered, though a field in sales, marketing, banking and finance are preferable. 
	Experience in sales of 6 – 12 months would be advantageous  
	Age between 20-32 years (Male or Female)
	Result –oriented, committed, flexibility, and self- driven individuals
	Good communication skills & negotiation skills
	Enjoy meeting new people and good relationship management 
	Basic computer literacy (MS Word/Excel, Internet, E-mail) is essential
	Good English would be an additional advantage. 

The Company offers a competitive remuneration package and attractive long term career prospective to work in a professional, transparent, exciting and ethical environment for all its staff.

If you’re interested and think you’re the right person, please submit your CV with cover letter and a recent photo (4x6) to HR Department by using the contact detail below: 

Email: sovandara.hong@prudential.com.kh 
Phone: 023 964 555

Deadline: No later than 25 February 2015 at 5:30PM

Phnom Penh Address:  Phnom Penh Tower, 20F, #445 Monivong Blvd, Boeung Prolit, 7 Makara, Phnom Penh, Kingdom of Cambodia

Notes: Certificates and supporting documents attached should be brought along when you are invited for interview.

Women and the disabled are encouraged to apply. Only short-listed candidates will be notified for interview. Received applications will not be returned.
Company Profile:
Prudential (Cambodia) Life Assurance PLC began operations in Cambodia in January 2013. It is the leading life insurer in Cambodia with more than USD280 million assured and 27,000 policies issued (as at 31 September 2015). One of the first life insurers in Cambodia, Prudential Cambodia is committed to raising the awareness of life insurance among the Cambodian people and helping them protect and secure their financial futures.

Prudential Cambodia is part of UK-based Prudential plc. Founded in 1848, Prudential plc is an international financial services group with significant operations in Asia, the US and the UK. It serves around 25 million insurance customers and have £505 billion of assets under management (as at 30 June 2015). Prudential plc is listed on the stock exchanges in London, Hong Kong, Singapore and New York.

Prudential plc is not affiliated in any manner with Prudential Financial, Inc., a company whose principal place of business is in the United States of America.
Contact Info: Contact Information Sovandara Hong  (855) 23 964 555 Phnom Penh Tower, 20F, #445 Monivong Blvd, Boeung Prolit, 7 Makara, Phnom Penh  (855) 23 964 555

Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.
